translation.en: ♪ Jingle bell Jingle bell, jingle bell rock ♪
translation.zh: 《圣诞满桌情》

translation.en: ♪ Snowin' and blowin' up Bushels of fun ♪
translation.zh: （莫莉的魔法菜单）

translation.en: ♪ Now, the jingle hop… ♪
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Mr. Braymore. -Oh. Hi, Molly. -How are you?
translation.zh: -布雷莫先生！ -嗨 莫莉 你好吗？

translation.en: Good. Did you decide on catering for the city hall weekly dinners?
translation.zh: 很好 你们决定好 由哪家为市政厅晚宴供应餐食吗？

translation.en: We did, and we're going with the Bradford Bros.
translation.zh: 是的 我们选择“布拉福德兄弟”

translation.en: They offered us a discount on a surf-and-turf we just couldn't pass up.
translation.zh: 他们的陆海双拼可以打折 我们实在无法拒绝

translation.en: I understand.
translation.zh: 我明白

translation.en: If you need anything, you know where to find me.
translation.zh: 如果未来有任何需要 你们知道去哪里找我

translation.en: Molly's Menu Magic: you name it, we cater it.
translation.zh: 莫莉的魔法菜单 只要你说得出 我们都满足

translation.en: -[chuckles] Bye. -Bye, Molly.
translation.zh: -再见 -再见 莫莉

translation.en: ♪ That's the jingle bell rock ♪
translation.zh: （布拉福德兄弟餐饮）

translation.en: "Committed to food excellence."
translation.zh: “致力追求美味”

translation.en: -How'd it go? -Good.
translation.zh: 怎么样？ 很好 商会很喜欢三明治和饼干

translation.en: Chamber of Commerce loved the sandwiches and cookies.
translation.zh: 很好 商会很喜欢三明治和饼干

translation.en: They placed a standing lunch order for their monthly meeting.
translation.zh: 还为每月例会午餐下了长期订单

translation.en: That's great.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: But we lost city hall weekly dinners to the Bradford Bros.
translation.zh: 但市政厅每周例行晚餐的订单 被“布拉福德兄弟”抢跑了

translation.en: What? No!
translation.zh: 什么？真糟糕！

translation.en: Adding insult to injury, those were all over town.
translation.zh: 他们还往伤口上撒盐 镇子上到处都是这东西

translation.en: That was actually on the front door.
translation.zh: 这张就出现在门前

translation.en: They would love getting every catering job,
translation.zh: 他们巴不得把镇上的餐饮生意全包

translation.en: even if it meant putting us out of business.
translation.zh: 甚至不惜把我们逼到倒闭

translation.en: Well, good thing we put out the magnets before the holiday season.
translation.zh: 幸好我们在假日季开始前 就把磁铁放了出去

translation.en: Those were a brilliant idea because no one throws magnets away, unlike…
translation.zh: 那真是好主意 没有人会丢掉磁铁 而这种东西…

translation.en: -Any new calls? -No.
translation.zh: -有别的来电吗？ -没有

translation.en: I should probably get in line to see Santa with all the other kids in town.
translation.zh: 我应该跟其他孩子一样 排队去见圣诞老人

translation.en: If you think that'll work, I'll come with you.
translation.zh: 如果你觉得这样管用 我陪你去

translation.en: Okay, there. What do you think?
translation.zh: 好了 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: You are amazing.
translation.zh: 你太厉害了

translation.en: You know, it's just missing one thing.
translation.zh: 要知道 现在只缺一样

translation.en: -[Molly] There. -You are amazing.
translation.zh: -好了 -你真棒

translation.en: I love it. I'm gonna go drop it off.
translation.zh: 我喜欢 我这就送过去

translation.en: Great. I'll start on the quiches. Oh, I am meeting my brother for dinner.
translation.zh: 我开始做乳蛋饼 我要到圣诞广场和我哥哥一起吃晚饭

translation.en: -Do you mind locking up after? -Oh, yeah. No problem.
translation.zh: -你介意收工后关店吗？ -没问题

translation.en: -Tell Kyle I say hi. -I will.
translation.zh: -替我问候凯尔 -我会的

translation.en: Are you sure you can't join us for Christmas in the Keys?
translation.zh: 你确定不能跟我们 去佛罗里达群岛过圣诞节吗？

translation.en: The beach house has more than enough room.
translation.zh: -海边的房子有足够的空间 -我也想去

translation.en: I wish I could. I have a couple holiday orders.
translation.zh: -海边的房子有足够的空间 -我也想去 我接了几份假日订单 不能取消

translation.en: I can't afford to cancel them.
translation.zh: 我接了几份假日订单 不能取消

translation.en: We're proud of you, baby sis. You're really making a go of your catering company.
translation.zh: 我们为你感到骄傲 小妹 你的公司做得风生水起

translation.en: Well, I've sunk every penny I have into it.
translation.zh: 我把家底全投进去了

translation.en: It's my lifelong dream. I… I can't afford to fail.
translation.zh: 这是我一生的梦想 我不能失败

translation.en: It hasn't even been a year and you're already too busy
translation.zh: 一年时间不到 你已经忙到

translation.en: for the annual Frost family Christmas vacation.
translation.zh: 顾不上参加 弗罗斯特家的年度圣诞假期

translation.en: We'll celebrate Christmas when I'm back.
translation.zh: 等我回来 我们就庆祝圣诞节

translation.en: [Kyle] Is that… That's my ex and his new girlfriend.
translation.zh: -那不是… -我前任和他的新女友

translation.en: I thought he was a decent guy. What happened?
translation.zh: 我以为他是好人 什么情况？

translation.en: We weren't on the same page and it took me much longer than it should have
translation.zh: 我们意见不合 我花了太长时间才意识到这一点

translation.en: to realize that.
translation.zh: 我花了太长时间才意识到这一点

translation.en: And he refused to try new food.
translation.zh: 他拒绝尝试新食物

translation.en: In my experience, the three Cs of a healthy relationship
translation.zh: 健康情侣关系有三个要素

translation.en: are communication, commitment, and compromise.
translation.zh: 沟通 承诺 妥协

translation.en: Okay. Well, I will remember that when I decide to dive back into the dating pool.
translation.zh: 好吧 等我重回情场时会记住的

translation.en: I just want you to be happy.
translation.zh: 我只希望你能幸福

translation.en: If I can make Molly's Menu Magic a success,
translation.zh: 如果我能够 把“莫莉的魔法菜单”经营成功

translation.en: I will be as happy as a kid on Christmas morning.
translation.zh: 我就会幸福得像圣诞清晨的孩子

translation.en: [British accent] Welcome home, Mr. Harrison. Or should I say Mr. Jacob?
translation.zh: 欢迎回家 哈里森先生 还是说应该叫你雅各布先生？

translation.en: [British accent] Very funny, Robert.
translation.zh: 很好笑 罗伯特

translation.en: [laughing, American accent] Oh, Cars, it's good to see you.
translation.zh: 卡森 见到你真高兴

translation.en: -It is good to see you too. -Once a year doesn't seem enough.
translation.zh: -我也是 -一年一次可不够啊

translation.en: Not much use for event photographers around here.
translation.zh: 活动摄影师在这里没什么用武之地

translation.en: -Do you have any luggage? -No. I'll get it later.
translation.zh: -你带行李了吗？ -不用 我晚点再拿

translation.en: Where is she?
translation.zh: 她在哪里？

translation.en: She's in the library putting the finishing touches on the Christmas tree.
translation.zh: 在图书馆 圣诞树装点收尾中

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna catch up with you later.
translation.zh: 我们一会再聊

translation.en: I wanna surprise her.
translation.zh: 我想给她一个惊喜

translation.en: There.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Now you look perfect.
translation.zh: 现在就完美了

translation.en: [gasps] Carson!
translation.zh: 卡森！

translation.en: I'm so glad you're home. Oh, I'm so glad to be back.
translation.zh: -你回家真是太好了！ -能回来真高兴

translation.en: You don't normally come until the morning of the Christmas Gala.
translation.zh: 通常你都是圣诞庆典当天早上才到

translation.en: Well, my show in Milan ended early, so…
translation.zh: 我在米兰的展出提前结束了 于是…

translation.en: I'm glad, and I expect full photo approval.
translation.zh: 太好了 那拍照的事就交给你了

translation.en: -Oh, that goes without saying. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 那还用说嘛

translation.en: -Are you hungry? -Uh, no.
translation.zh: -你饿了吗？ -不饿

translation.en: I'll make myself something later if I get hungry.
translation.zh: 一会要是饿了 我就自己弄点吃的

translation.en: Since when do you cook?
translation.zh: 你什么时候开始做饭了？

translation.en: Well, I'm a whiz in the kitchen with anything to do
translation.zh: 我可是厨房妙手 掺奶倒水都不在话下

translation.en: with mixing milk or water.
translation.zh: 掺奶倒水都不在话下

translation.en: Just the basic things.
translation.zh: 就是一些简单的东西而已

translation.en: Shall I show you the plans for this year's Christmas Gala?
translation.zh: 要不要看看今年圣诞庆典的计划？

translation.en: It's pretty much the same every year, isn't it?
translation.zh: 每年都是一样的 对吧？

translation.en: Tell you what, next year when you take over the foundation,
translation.zh: 我跟你说 明年 等你接手基金会

translation.en: you can change things up however you like.
translation.zh: 到时你想改成什么样都可以

translation.en: I am not taking over the foundation.
translation.zh: 我不会接手基金会的

translation.en: One of the cousins will be much better.
translation.zh: 其他表亲会更合适

translation.en: The cousins have too many responsibilities as it is
translation.zh: 你那些表亲们事务太多

translation.en: and are already stretched too thin.
translation.zh: 兼顾不迭

translation.en: Tell you what, you're tired. We will discuss this at another time.
translation.zh: 我跟你说 你现在累了 这件事我们下次再聊

translation.en: That sounds good.
translation.zh: 听起来不错

translation.en: Carson, I'm glad you're home.
translation.zh: 卡森 你能回来我真高兴

translation.en: So am I.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Tell me about Milan.
translation.zh: 给我讲讲米兰的事

translation.en: -Morning. -Good morning.
translation.zh: -早安 -早上好

translation.en: Would you like some juice or a Danish?
translation.zh: 要喝果汁 还是来块丹麦酥？

translation.en: Uh, no. Just some tea.
translation.zh: 有茶就行 我来

translation.en: Ah, I got it. You don't have to take care of me.
translation.zh: 有茶就行 我来 -你不用照顾我 -这是我的工作

translation.en: It's my job to take care of you.
translation.zh: -你不用照顾我 -这是我的工作

translation.en: Maybe it's time to settle down in one place?
translation.zh: 也许你也是时候 在一个地方安顿下来了？

translation.en: Wow. That was an amazing impression of Aunt Jean.
translation.zh: 哇 你学珍姑姑学得真像

translation.en: I may be parroting her concerns, but I think of you like my own nephew.
translation.zh: 我也许说出了她的牵挂 不过…我可是把你当作自己的亲侄子

translation.en: I know, but I enjoy not having my future mapped out for me.
translation.zh: 我知道 但我还是享受 未知的前路人生

translation.en: No obligations, no one knows I'm part of the Harrison dynasty.
translation.zh: 没有义务 没人知道 我是哈里森王朝的一员

translation.en: Your aunt worries about you. I know she's looking forward to--
translation.zh: 你姑姑担心你 我知道她很期待…

translation.en: The Gala is a thank-you to our board and benefactors,
translation.zh: 圣诞庆典 是对董事会和赞助人表示感谢

translation.en: and I will not serve them an over-salted entrée
translation.zh: 我可不会让他们 吃咸过头的主菜和甜品

translation.en: and dessert bars that taste as if they came
translation.zh: 我可不会让他们 吃咸过头的主菜和甜品 味道就像超市里摆了一天的剩菜

translation.en: from the day-old section of the supermarket.
translation.zh: 味道就像超市里摆了一天的剩菜

translation.en: You quit? Fine.
translation.zh: 你不干了？那好

translation.en: And meanwhile, I will look for a caterer who understands the meaning of high-quality cuisine.
translation.zh: 我会找一位 真正懂高品质美食的承办人

translation.en: Thank you. Goodbye.
translation.zh: 多谢 再见

translation.en: We need a new caterer.
translation.zh: 我们必须另找他人承办晚宴了

translation.en: -Christmas Gala's in eight days, right? -I am well aware of that.
translation.zh: -八天以后就是圣诞庆典了吧？ -这点我很清楚

translation.en: Robert, who else do we have in the file?
translation.zh: 罗伯特 档案里还有什么人选？

translation.en: Oh, my. I appreciate your organizational abilities.
translation.zh: 哎呀 你做事真是井井有条

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: which shall we choose?
translation.zh: 我们选哪一家呢？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Happy holidays. How can I help you?
translation.zh: 假日愉快 有什么能为您效劳？

translation.en: Uh… I'm looking for Molly Frost.
translation.zh: 我找莫莉·弗罗斯特

translation.en: I'm Molly.
translation.zh: 我就是莫莉

translation.en: I'm Jean Harrison of the Harrison Foundation.
translation.zh: 我是哈里森基金会的珍·哈里森

translation.en: Yes, of course. Your family's done incredible things for the community.
translation.zh: 知道 您的家族为社区做了许多好事

translation.en: Your grant to the local school saved the arts program.
translation.zh: 你们的经费让学校保住了人文课程 其他的课程也是

translation.en: All of the programs, really. It's incredible.
translation.zh: 你们的经费让学校保住了人文课程 其他的课程也是 太了不起了

translation.en: What can I do for you, Mrs. Harrison?
translation.zh: 有何能为您效劳 哈里森夫人？

translation.en: I could've called, but I find it is important
translation.zh: 原本打个电话就行 但我觉得

translation.en: to see the catering premises for myself.
translation.zh: 亲眼看看餐饮环境也很重要

translation.en: Understood. We have all our licenses and certifications.
translation.zh: 明白了 我们的执照和证书齐全

translation.en: Yes, I see that.
translation.zh: 对 我知道

translation.en: Every year we have a Christmas Gala with a dinner on December 23rd.
translation.zh: 每年12月23日 我们都会举办庆典

translation.en: -I know it's short notice. -I would love to.
translation.zh: -时间仓促… -我愿意！

translation.en: Excellent.
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: Are you available to come for an interview this afternoon at three o'clock?
translation.zh: 你今天下午三点有空来面试吗？

translation.en: Oh, an interview?
translation.zh: 面试？

translation.en: I need to be assured that you can indeed create magical cuisine.
translation.zh: 我要确认你能创造神奇美食

translation.en: Of course. I will be there.
translation.zh: 当然 我会去的

translation.en: Thank you for the opportunity. No, thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢您给我这个机会 -不 谢你才对

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Jean Harrison might want us to cater the Harrison Foundation Christmas Gala.
translation.zh: 珍·哈里森可能想让我们 承办哈里森基金会的圣诞庆典 -那可是年度最大的盛会啊 -我知道

translation.en: -That's the biggest event of the year. -I know.
translation.zh: -那可是年度最大的盛会啊 -我知道

translation.en: We have to be there at 3:00. I think she might want us to make her a meal.
translation.zh: 我们三点要过去 她可能会让我们做餐食

translation.en: But what about the Christmas dessert
translation.zh: 那今天下午为长者活动

translation.en: that we're catering for the senior citizen event this afternoon?
translation.zh: 准备圣诞甜点怎么办？

translation.en: Right. That's today.
translation.zh: 对哦 是今天啊

translation.en: Okay. If you can do that on your own, maybe Cindy can help me.
translation.zh: 如果你能自己搞定… -好啊 -…或许辛迪可以帮我

translation.en: -Uh… -Oh, no. She's out of town.
translation.zh: 她去外地了

translation.en: You don't know him, but my friend Taylor is a fantastic sous chef
translation.zh: 虽然你不认识 我的朋友泰勒是位出色的副主厨

translation.en: and he's in between jobs right now.
translation.zh: 他目前没工作

translation.en: -I'll just text him. -Yes, please.
translation.zh: -我会发短信给他 -好啊 拜托

translation.en: He's one town away, so he's not that far.
translation.zh: -他就在邻镇 离得不远 -太好了

translation.en: -Great. -[phone chimes] He's free.
translation.zh: 他有空

translation.en: Wow. Amazing. -Okay, tell him to meet me there. -Okay.
translation.zh: -哇 太棒了 叫他过去跟我会合 -好

translation.en: Now I just have to figure out what to serve. Oh, you got this.
translation.zh: -现在我得想想该做些什么了 -你没问题的

translation.en: You must be Molly. Lovely to meet you, Mr. Harrison.
translation.zh: -你一定就是莫莉 -很高兴见到你 哈里森先生

translation.en: Mr. Harrison passed many years ago.
translation.zh: 哈里森先生多年前就去世了

translation.en: I'm Robert, the long-time, but not long-suffering, estate manager.
translation.zh: 我是罗伯特 效力多年而乐此不疲的管业经理

translation.en: -Please come in. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -请进 -谢谢

translation.en: Wow. It's beautiful.
translation.zh: 哇 这里真漂亮

translation.en: Jean decorated everything herself. Let me show you the kitchen.
translation.zh: 所有装饰都是珍亲自督办的 我带你到厨房去

translation.en: This is my dream kitchen.
translation.zh: 这是我梦想中的厨房

translation.en: Jean would like you to prepare her a three-course holiday meal.
translation.zh: 珍希望你准备一顿三道菜的节日餐

translation.en: You will, of course, be compensated for your time today.
translation.zh: 当然 今日占用你的时间 我们会做出补偿

translation.en: Any dietary restrictions?
translation.zh: -有任何忌口吗？ -完全没有

translation.en: None whatsoever, though she does have a certain fondness for chocolate.
translation.zh: -有任何忌口吗？ -完全没有 -但她很喜欢吃巧克力 -正合我意

translation.en: After my own heart.
translation.zh: -但她很喜欢吃巧克力 -正合我意

translation.en: When my sous chef arrives, will you send him in?
translation.zh: -等我的副主厨到了 可否让他进来？ -当然

translation.en: Certainly. Good luck.
translation.zh: -等我的副主厨到了 可否让他进来？ -当然 -祝你好运 -谢谢

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: -祝你好运 -谢谢

translation.en: [Molly] There you are. Finally.
translation.zh: 你总算来了

translation.en: -Finally? -Are your hands clean?
translation.zh: -总算？ -你的手干净吗？

translation.en: -Just washed 'em. -Great. You can finish mincing the celery.
translation.zh: -刚刚洗过 -很好 你来把芹菜切碎

translation.en: Carrots need to be julienned, parsnips need to be peeled and chopped.
translation.zh: 胡萝卜要切丝 蒲芹萝卜要削皮和切碎

translation.en: What are we making?
translation.zh: 我们要做什么？ 节日传统番茄沙拉

translation.en: An heirloom tomato salad with lemon-thyme panko-crusted chicken and parsnip purée.
translation.zh: 节日传统番茄沙拉 柠檬百里香面包糠鸡肉 还有蒲芹萝卜泥

translation.en: For dessert, a pistachio cranberry fudge brownie.
translation.zh: 甜点是开心果蔓越莓软糖布朗尼

translation.en: Yum. Hope I get to have some.
translation.zh: 美味 但愿我也吃得到

translation.en: Very funny.
translation.zh: 真好笑

translation.en: Get to work. We don't have much time.
translation.zh: 开始工作吧 我们时间不多了

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 遵命 女士

translation.en: The celery needs to be minced.
translation.zh: 芹菜要切碎

translation.en: Cut into very small pieces?
translation.zh: 切成小块

translation.en: [Carson] Is that better?
translation.zh: 这样好些吗？

translation.en: Who taught you how to hold a knife?
translation.zh: 你的握刀姿势是谁教的？

translation.en: You move your hand up like that.
translation.zh: 手抬起来 像这样

translation.en: That's better. -This needs to be perfect. -Why's that?
translation.zh: -这样好多了 今天必须尽善尽美 -为什么？

translation.en: Didn't Christina tell you? This is for Jean Harrison.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜没告诉你吗？ 这是为珍·哈里森准备的

translation.en: She's fired nearly every catering company she's ever used.
translation.zh: 本地的餐饮公司 凡是被她雇佣的 基本都被炒了

translation.en: Apparently, she's impossible to please. Is that so?
translation.zh: -显然 取悦她难如登天 -是吗？

translation.en: Who else hires a caterer to come to their house and cook as an interview?
translation.zh: 谁还会把承办餐饮的人 叫来烹饪面试？

translation.en: Well, I guess you didn't have to come. Are you kidding?
translation.zh: -你也不一定非要来吧 -你开什么玩笑？

translation.en: This dinner could make my career. I need this job.
translation.zh: 这顿晚餐很可能成就我的事业 我需要这份工作

translation.en: Gotcha.
translation.zh: 明白

translation.en: Your sous chef is here. He's washing his hands.
translation.zh: 你的副主厨来了 他正在洗手

translation.en: -Then who…? -Carson, what are you doing down here?
translation.zh: -那你是… -卡森 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: I was just coming in to get a snack, and I was put to work.
translation.zh: 我是来找零食的 结果被使唤干活了

translation.en: Your aunt would like to see you. Your aunt? Wh-Who's your aunt? Not…
translation.zh: -你姑姑想见你 -你姑姑？谁是你姑姑？莫非…

translation.en: Jean Harrison. Yeah.
translation.zh: 珍·哈里森 听我说…

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry. I was just… Everything looks delicious.
translation.zh: 真的很抱歉 我只是… 这些看起来都很美味

translation.en: [Robert] Carson!
translation.zh: 卡森！

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: And good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: Is that Champagne vinegar?
translation.zh: 你用了香槟醋吗？

translation.en: Yes. I found some in the back of the pantry.
translation.zh: 是的 我在储藏室找到的

translation.en: You should've used the grainy mustard.
translation.zh: 你应该用芥末籽

translation.en: And I think it needs a touch more garlic to balance out the lemon.
translation.zh: 我觉得需要多放一点大蒜 来平衡柠檬的味道

translation.en: You really know your flavoring agents.
translation.zh: 您对调料颇有研究

translation.en: I have hosted many, many dinner parties over the years.
translation.zh: 这些年我举办了无数场晚宴

translation.en: Oh, you're done? Would you like the dessert?
translation.zh: 您不吃了 要用甜点吗？

translation.en: A brownie?
translation.zh: 布朗尼？

translation.en: Yes. I adapted my grandmother's recipe. She used to make it every December.
translation.zh: 是的 我发挥了外婆的食谱 她每年12月都会做

translation.en: This is very good. Thank you.
translation.zh: -这个很好吃 -谢谢

translation.en: But it doesn't compare with my grandfather's Christmas walnut fudge.
translation.zh: 但这跟我祖父的圣诞核桃软糖没法比

translation.en: If you have the recipe, I would be happy to make it for you.
translation.zh: 如果有食谱 我很乐意为您做

translation.en: Unfortunately, the recipe was never written down,
translation.zh: 只可惜 食谱未被记录下来

translation.en: and despite many attempts, no one has ever managed to re-create it.
translation.zh: 虽然做过数次尝试 还是没人做得出来

translation.en: I'm sorry if this was not to your taste. Oh, no. It was delicious.
translation.zh: -很遗憾这些不合您口味 -不 这个很好吃

translation.en: -Oh, so does that mean-- -Don is on the phone.
translation.zh: -您是说… -唐打来电话

translation.en: That's the president of my board. I must take this, if you'll excuse me?
translation.zh: 我的董事会主席 我必须接这个电话 不好意思

translation.en: Oh, okay. Uh, but the Gala?
translation.zh: 那庆典的事呢？

translation.en: Yes, I have another interview, and then I'll let you know my decision.
translation.zh: 我还有一场面试 然后再通知你

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Don, so good of you to get back to me.
translation.zh: 唐 你能回电真是太好了 对

translation.en: Yes, I wanted to…
translation.zh: 唐 你能回电真是太好了 对 我之前想…

translation.en: Hi. Uh, how'd it go?
translation.zh: 嗨！怎么样？

translation.en: I don't know. Thanks for your help earlier.
translation.zh: 我不知道 谢谢你刚才帮忙

translation.en: Oh, I just walked in the kitchen. You put me to work.
translation.zh: 我走进去 你让我做事

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry about that.
translation.zh: 听着 我真的很抱歉

translation.en: I hope I didn't throw you off your rhythm too much. I was just trying to be helpful.
translation.zh: 但愿我没有让你手忙脚乱 我只是想帮忙

translation.en: You're not gonna tell your aunt what I said, are you?
translation.zh: 你不会把我的话告诉你姑姑吧？

translation.en: That she's, uh, difficult and impossible to please?
translation.zh: 说取悦她难如登天？

translation.en: I didn't mean that. I never would've said that if I had known who you were.
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思 如果我知道你是谁 我一定不会那么说

translation.en: -I know. That's what everyone says. -[vehicle approaching]
translation.zh: 我知道 大家都这么说

translation.en: I better go. Your next interview's here.
translation.zh: 我还是走吧 你的下一位面试候选人来了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I've never met Taylor. I thought it was him.
translation.zh: 我从没见过泰勒 还以为那个人就是他

translation.en: I just can't believe it was her nephew.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信那人是她的侄子

translation.en: If he tells Jean what I said, we're definitely not getting the job.
translation.zh: 如果他把我的话告诉珍 那我们肯定拿不到这一单了

translation.en: I'm kinda curious now. So, you said his name was Carson?
translation.zh: 我很好奇 你说他叫卡森？

translation.en: Yeah. What are you looking up?
translation.zh: 对 你在查什么？

translation.en: Let's try this link.
translation.zh: 我们试试这个链接

translation.en: Yeah, okay, so, "Since the Great Depression,
translation.zh: 好的… “自大萧条以来 哈里森家族几代人

translation.en: generations of Harrison family members have given back to the community
translation.zh: “自大萧条以来 哈里森家族几代人 一直坚持回馈社区 助力创造更好的未来”

translation.en: to help make a better future for all."
translation.zh: 一直坚持回馈社区 助力创造更好的未来”

translation.en: I didn't realize the foundation went back that far.
translation.zh: 真没想到基金会的历史这么悠久

translation.en: Huh. Here are photos from the Christmas Gala.
translation.zh: 这里还有圣诞庆典的照片

translation.en: That's him.
translation.zh: 就是他

translation.en: He's cute. You can't tell me you didn't think he was attractive.
translation.zh: 他很帅 你总不能说 你觉得他没有魅力吧

translation.en: -I didn't notice. -Really?
translation.zh: -我没注意到 -真的吗？

translation.en: Yes. I was focused on making a three-course meal.
translation.zh: 是啊 我当时要全神贯注做三道餐点

translation.en: Oh, okay. [laughs]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Don't worry, we'll hear from them soon.
translation.zh: 别担心 很快就会有消息的

translation.en: Oh! Getting the Harrison Gala dinner would be huge.
translation.zh: 接到哈里森圣诞庆典这单 对我们非常重要

translation.en: -I need this job. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我需要这单工作 -是啊

translation.en: Here's to hoping.
translation.zh: 愿我们有好运

translation.en: We got this.
translation.zh: 我们能行

translation.en: [Carson] Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 -卡森

translation.en: -Carson. -Am I disturbing you?
translation.zh: -嗨 -卡森 -会打扰你吗？ -完全没有 来 坐下

translation.en: -Not at all. Come in. Sit down. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -会打扰你吗？ -完全没有 来 坐下 谢谢

translation.en: Where have you been hiding all evening?
translation.zh: 你去哪里了？ 我在楼上和我的经纪人伊莎贝拉通话

translation.en: I was just upstairs on the phone with my agent Isabella.
translation.zh: 我在楼上和我的经纪人伊莎贝拉通话

translation.en: She's planning my next gig.
translation.zh: 她在计划我的下一场活动

translation.en: Is that right?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Don't worry, it's after Christmas.
translation.zh: 别担心 至少要到圣诞节以后

translation.en: Good. That's good.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: So… how did the interviews with the caterers go?
translation.zh: 承办宴席的面试进展如何？

translation.en: They were both professional.
translation.zh: 两家都很专业

translation.en: The food was fresh, delicious.
translation.zh: 食物新鲜美味

translation.en: The platings and presentation were both excellent,
translation.zh: 摆盘呈现都很棒

translation.en: but I'm leaning toward the Bradford Bros.
translation.zh: -但我更倾向于“布拉福德兄弟” -为什么？

translation.en: -Uh… Why's that? -They've been in the business longer.
translation.zh: -但我更倾向于“布拉福德兄弟” -为什么？ 他们从业更久 经验更丰富

translation.en: They have more experience with dinners like this.
translation.zh: 他们从业更久 经验更丰富

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 这样啊

translation.en: You know…
translation.zh: 要知道…

translation.en: I thought Molly's Menu Magic was impressive myself.
translation.zh: “莫莉的魔法菜单”令我印象深刻

translation.en: Really? Why do you say that?
translation.zh: 真的吗？你为什么这么说？

translation.en: -Well, I saw her in the kitchen-- -Molly?
translation.zh: -我在厨房见到她… -莫莉？

translation.en: Yes, Molly, in the kitchen, and I was impressed by her technique.
translation.zh: 对 我在厨房遇见她 她的技艺令人佩服

translation.en: -Hmm. -Her attention to detail.
translation.zh: 她对细节的关注

translation.en: She made every little thing look perfect. -I thought you would appreciate that. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 她让每个细节看起来都很完美 我以为你会欣赏这一点

translation.en: After all, experience doesn't always equal energy and enthusiasm.
translation.zh: 毕竟 经验并不总是 能够匹敌能量和热情

translation.en: You may be right.
translation.zh: 也许你说得对

translation.en: Molly's Menu Magic it is.
translation.zh: 那就选“莫莉的魔法菜单”

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Carson, I am very happy to see you finally taking an interest in the Gala.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你终于对这次庆典感兴趣

translation.en: Well, you know me, I'm happy to help when I'm in town.
translation.zh: 你了解我的 我在这里时 很愿意帮忙

translation.en: Well then, here you go.
translation.zh: 好 那就交给你了

translation.en: -What-- -Take over planning the dinner.
translation.zh: -什么？ -接手晚宴策划

translation.en: Aunt Jean, I've got no experience event planning.
translation.zh: 珍姑姑 我没有活动策划的经验

translation.en: I just take the photographs. You're smart, you know what to do.
translation.zh: -我只会拍照 -你很聪明 知道该怎么做

translation.en: I have faith in you.
translation.zh: 我对你有信心

translation.en: What about Stephanie? She's normally your second in command.
translation.zh: 那斯蒂芬妮呢？她通常是你的二把手

translation.en: Your cousin has enough on her plate, plus a new baby,
translation.zh: 你的表姐事情已经够多了 再加上刚生了娃

translation.en: and honestly, this year I'm just feeling…
translation.zh: 老实说 今年我感觉有点…

translation.en: overwhelmed.
translation.zh: 力不从心

translation.en: I can't do this by myself anymore.
translation.zh: 我一个人坚持不下去了

translation.en: Okay. I'll take over the dinner.
translation.zh: 好 晚宴的事 我来接手

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I will give Molly a call. You can take it from there.
translation.zh: 我会给莫莉打电话 之后就交给你了

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Carson, you know how important this dinner is.
translation.zh: 卡森 你知道这次晚宴有多重要

translation.en: Yes, I know.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道

translation.en: But, Aunt Jean, this doesn't mean that I'm gonna be working
translation.zh: 不过 珍姑姑 这并不代表 我会全职为基金会做事

translation.en: for the foundation full-time, okay?
translation.zh: 我会全职为基金会做事

translation.en: Our focus will be on making this Christmas Gala the best that it can be.
translation.zh: 我们先专心将此次圣诞庆典做到最好

translation.en: We can discuss your future role at another time.
translation.zh: 你未来的角色以后再讨论

translation.en: -Leo. -Hey.
translation.zh: -利奥 -嘿

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Who are these for?
translation.zh: 这些是给谁的？

translation.en: Oh, uh, Tammy. Bookstore.
translation.zh: 塔米 书店的订单

translation.en: Oh. Yeah, I'm prepping for the big art gallery holiday party tonight.
translation.zh: 我在为今晚 艺术画廊的大型假日派对做准备

translation.en: It's gonna be like 200 people, you know?
translation.zh: 那可是200人的规模

translation.en: Wow. That's great. Yeah.
translation.zh: -哇 太好了 -是啊

translation.en: Have you heard from Jean Harrison?
translation.zh: 珍·哈里森给你回复了吗？

translation.en: Not yet, but, uh…
translation.zh: 还没有 不过…

translation.en: Look, she was swooning over our lobster gnocchi, so…
translation.zh: 我们的龙虾汤团征服了她 所以…

translation.en: I wouldn't hold my breath, no offense.
translation.zh: 无意冒犯 但你还是别抱太大期望

translation.en: None taken. I'm sure it was divine.
translation.zh: 没事 我相信汤团一定是极致美味

translation.en: -Here. Allow me. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -来 让我来 -谢谢

translation.en: Excuse me. Molly Frost. Hello?
translation.zh: 不好意思 喂 我是莫莉·弗罗斯特

translation.en: Yes. Okay.
translation.zh: 好的 没问题

translation.en: That is fantastic. Thank you, Jean.
translation.zh: 太好了 谢谢您 珍

translation.en: Yes, I will be there. Thank you again.
translation.zh: 我一定去 再次感谢您

translation.en: I better go. I have a big gala to plan. Good luck with your party tonight.
translation.zh: 我得走了 要筹备庆典的事 祝你派对活动顺利

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: Welcome back, and congratulations.
translation.zh: 欢迎回来 恭喜你

translation.en: Thanks. Uh, this is for Jean.
translation.zh: 谢谢 这是送给珍的

translation.en: Walnut fudge. Feel free to help yourself.
translation.zh: 核桃软糖 请用

translation.en: I'm not one for sweets, though I do enjoy a nice gingerbread every now and then.
translation.zh: 我不怎么吃甜食 不过偶尔也爱来一块美味的姜饼

translation.en: Please, come in.
translation.zh: 请进

translation.en: Excuse me, Carson. Ms. Molly is here for the catering meeting.
translation.zh: 不好意思 卡森 莫莉女士来了

translation.en: It is good to see you again.
translation.zh: 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: I thought I was meeting Jean.
translation.zh: 我还以为是来见珍的

translation.en: Actually, Aunt Jean is letting me oversee the food this year.
translation.zh: 事实上 珍姑姑让我负责今年的晚宴

translation.en: -Oh. -I'll leave you two to it.
translation.zh: 那我就不打扰二位了

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you, Robert.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -谢谢你 罗伯特

translation.en: We didn't officially meet the other day. I'm Carson.
translation.zh: 我们还没正式认识 我是卡森

translation.en: Molly.
translation.zh: 莫莉

translation.en: -Uh, shall we get started? -Yes. Please have a seat.
translation.zh: -那我们开始吧？ -好的 请坐

translation.en: Oh, those are cute.
translation.zh: 那些很可爱

translation.en: Oh, yeah. My aunt collects them.
translation.zh: 是珍姑姑收藏的

translation.en: She's got, like, 200 in this house.
translation.zh: 家里大概有200多件呢

translation.en: Wow, it's quite a collection.
translation.zh: 哇 非常可观

translation.en: -Can I get you anything to drink? -I'm fine. Thank you.
translation.zh: -我能给你拿点喝的吗？ -不用了 谢谢

translation.en: Have you decided on a menu?
translation.zh: -你决定好菜单了吗？ -还没有

translation.en: -Not yet. -What about the budget?
translation.zh: -你决定好菜单了吗？ -还没有 -那预算呢？ -预算重要吗？

translation.en: Uh… Does that matter?
translation.zh: -那预算呢？ -预算重要吗？

translation.en: It usually helps determine the menu options.
translation.zh: 预算通常有助于确定菜单

translation.en: Well, then it's a very important question, I'll find out.
translation.zh: 那就很重要了 我会搞清楚 你们去年提供了什么餐品？ 我也好大概有个概念

translation.en: To give me an idea, what did you serve last year?
translation.zh: 你们去年提供了什么餐品？ 我也好大概有个概念

translation.en: Prime rib and, uh…
translation.zh: 上等牛肋…不对

translation.en: No, uh, chicken and fish, I think, and a lot of tiny little puffy, fancy things.
translation.zh: 鸡肉和鱼 还有很多蓬松的高级小东西

translation.en: Buffet or seated dinner?
translation.zh: 自助餐还是上菜？

translation.en: Look, the truth is, I've been to every single one of these Galas
translation.zh: 其实 我年年参加圣诞庆典

translation.en: since I was five years old, and they're all kind of running together.
translation.zh: 从我五岁时就开始了 感觉我全都记混了

translation.en: Okay, how many people are you expecting?
translation.zh: 大概要招待多少人？

translation.en: I will have to get back to you on that too.
translation.zh: 这个我也要弄清楚再告诉你

translation.en: What about the venue? The dinner space? What about it?
translation.zh: -场地呢 用餐地点？ -怎么了？

translation.en: -Where's dinner happening? -It's the same place every year.
translation.zh: -在哪里设宴？ -每年都是同一地点

translation.en: Which is where?
translation.zh: 是在哪里呢？

translation.en: It's the living room, but they use it for entertaining.
translation.zh: 客厅 但他们用作娱乐空间

translation.en: Oh, do you wanna have a look yourself?
translation.zh: 你想看看吗？ 那会很有帮助

translation.en: -Yeah, that would be helpful. -Good.
translation.zh: 那会很有帮助 好 在后面楼上

translation.en: Uh, it's back upstairs.
translation.zh: 好 在后面楼上

translation.en: Okay, here it is.
translation.zh: 就是这里

translation.en: Um… We're gonna have all the furniture moved out
translation.zh: 到时会把家具都挪走

translation.en: and we're gonna have tables brought in.
translation.zh: 然后把餐桌搬进来

translation.en: It's beautiful.
translation.zh: 这里很漂亮

translation.en: I hear your Gala is the Christmas party of the year.
translation.zh: 听说你们的庆典是圣诞年度盛会

translation.en: Yeah. I suppose it is.
translation.zh: 对 应该是吧

translation.en: The dinner doubles as a fundraiser for the foundation.
translation.zh: 晚宴同时也是基金会的筹款活动

translation.en: Essentially, it's another day in the office, just with fancier food.
translation.zh: 跟公事差不多 就是多了高档餐食

translation.en: Maybe we can change that with the menu.
translation.zh: 也许我们可以利用菜单改变这一点

translation.en: Holiday traditions unite family and friends.
translation.zh: 节日传统让家人和朋友团聚在一起

translation.en: Food brings back memories, brings people together.
translation.zh: 食物会唤起人们的回忆 拉近彼此距离

translation.en: I like that. Food is more than just food.
translation.zh: 我喜欢 食物不仅仅是食物

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: So we don't know the menu, budget, or number of people?
translation.zh: 菜单 预算 人数 全都不知道？

translation.en: Nope. But we do know the date: December 23rd.
translation.zh: 是啊 但日期定了 12月23日

translation.en: Oh, well, that's something.
translation.zh: 总算还有些信息

translation.en: He was gonna get more details and get back to us. We need more icing.
translation.zh: 他说会了解更多细节 我们糖霜不够了

translation.en: -There's more in the back. I'll get it. -Okay.
translation.zh: -后面还有 我去拿 -好的

translation.en: -Come in. -Hey.
translation.zh: 请进！ 嘿

translation.en: Rough afternoon? -Occupational hazard. -Ah.
translation.zh: -下午很辛苦？ -干这行 没办法

translation.en: Moll, I don't think we have any…
translation.zh: 小莫 我们好像没有…

translation.en: Oh, this is Christina.
translation.zh: -这位是克里斯蒂娜 -嗨

translation.en: -Hi. -You must be Carson.
translation.zh: -这位是克里斯蒂娜 -嗨 想必你就是卡森 你好 久仰大名

translation.en: Hi. I've heard so much about you.
translation.zh: 想必你就是卡森 你好 久仰大名

translation.en: I'm flattered, I think.
translation.zh: 我受宠若惊…吧

translation.en: We are beyond honored to be catering your foundation's Christmas Gala dinner.
translation.zh: 我们很荣幸 为你们基金会的圣诞庆典提供餐饮

translation.en: Harrison family, legendary.
translation.zh: 哈里森家族十分传奇

translation.en: Thanks for saying that.
translation.zh: 多谢夸奖

translation.en: Do you want something to drink or, or eat, or…
translation.zh: 要喝点或吃点什么吗？

translation.en: -Actually, we need more icing? -Oh, no. I'm good. Thanks, though.
translation.zh: -我们需要更多糖霜 -不 我很好 谢谢你

translation.en: -Um, yeah, I'll-- -Good to meet you, Christina.
translation.zh: 那我… -幸会 克里斯蒂娜 -我也是

translation.en: You too.
translation.zh: -幸会 克里斯蒂娜 -我也是

translation.en: -So… -So…
translation.zh: -那么… -那么…

translation.en: You first.
translation.zh: 你先说

translation.en: -Do you have any more information? -Uh, yes.
translation.zh: 你了解到其他信息了吗？ 是的 当晚大概会有25位客人

translation.en: So, we are expecting 25 guests, approximately.
translation.zh: 是的 当晚大概会有25位客人

translation.en: Okay. Budget? The high end.
translation.zh: -好 预算呢？ -高端标准

translation.en: -Menu? -Now that is TBD.
translation.zh: -菜单？ -还待定

translation.en: I thought we could discuss it over peppermint hot chocolate, my treat.
translation.zh: 我想着咱们可以 边喝薄荷热巧克力边商量 我请客

translation.en: -I don't really-- -Strictly professional.
translation.zh: -我不… -纯为公事

translation.en: It's my guilty pleasure when I'm in town.
translation.zh: 这是我在这里最爱的罪恶享受

translation.en: Sure. I'll grab my coat and clean up.
translation.zh: 好啊 我去拿外套 顺便收拾一下

translation.en: -[Christmas music playing] -[Santa] Ho ho ho!
translation.zh: （哈里森基金会）

translation.en: -Thanks. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -不客气

translation.en: -You've had one of these before? -Yes. Every year since I was a kid.
translation.zh: -你以前喝过这个吗？ -有啊 从我小时候开始 每年都喝

translation.en: -Well, then you know. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 那你肯定懂

translation.en: I wait all year for this.
translation.zh: 我等了一整年 就为它

translation.en: [laughs] Where are you the rest of the year?
translation.zh: 那你一年中其余时间在哪里？

translation.en: Everywhere and nowhere. I'm an event photographer.
translation.zh: 无处不在 我是活动摄影师

translation.en: Interesting. Do you work for a particular magazine?
translation.zh: 有意思 你是为某家杂志社工作吗？

translation.en: No, I freelance. My agent finds me work all over.
translation.zh: 不 我是自由职业者 我的经纪人到处给我找活儿

translation.en: One day, it's a fashion show in Paris,
translation.zh: 今天是巴黎的时尚秀

translation.en: the next it's an engagement party on a yacht in Ibiza,
translation.zh: 明天是伊比沙岛的游艇订婚派对

translation.en: then it's a product tech launch party in Silicon Valley.
translation.zh: 后天是硅谷的产品技术发布会

translation.en: Blah, blah, blah. No, it sounds glamorous.
translation.zh: -诸如之类的 -听起来很光鲜

translation.en: Trust me, it's far from glamorous.
translation.zh: 相信我 一点都不光鲜

translation.en: It's long hours, and I'm never in the same place for more than a week.
translation.zh: 工作很耗时 在一个地方待不过一周

translation.en: So maintaining friendships…
translation.zh: 所以 交朋友…

translation.en: it can be difficult.
translation.zh: 有时很难

translation.en: Yeah, that would be hard. So how did you get into event photography?
translation.zh: 是的 那一定很难 你是怎么进入活动摄影这一行的？

translation.en: Uh, it started as a favor for a friend's graduation party,
translation.zh: 一开始是给朋友的毕业派对帮忙

translation.en: and then it grew from there.
translation.zh: 从此便入了行

translation.en: But I… I really love nature photography.
translation.zh: 但我非常喜欢自然摄影 我想多做这种尝试

translation.en: I wanna do more of that, but it doesn't really pay well.
translation.zh: 我想多做这种尝试 但是报酬不高 没什么工作

translation.en: There's not a lot of work.
translation.zh: 但是报酬不高 没什么工作

translation.en: Oh, speaking of work, I had some ideas I wanted to show you.
translation.zh: 说到这里 我有些想法想向你展示

translation.en: Yeah, bring it on.
translation.zh: 好啊 来吧

translation.en: Okay. For the hors d'oeuvres, I have a few options.
translation.zh: 好 开胃菜 有几个选择

translation.en: So, these are the mini-pesto and goat cheese appetizers.
translation.zh: 有迷你香蒜酱和山羊奶酪小吃

translation.en: Wow, they look great.
translation.zh: 哇 看起来很棒

translation.en: -[Carson] Yeah, can I? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -对 我可以吗？ -可以

translation.en: [Carson] Yeah, everything looks great. That's…
translation.zh: 一切看起来都很好 这…

translation.en: Truth is, this isn't really my area of expertise.
translation.zh: 说实话 这并非我的专长

translation.en: -I figured as much. -Yeah. I'm just gonna mess this up.
translation.zh: -我猜到了 -是啊 我会搞砸的

translation.en: You're the expert. I trust you.
translation.zh: 你是内行 我相信你

translation.en: What about Jean?
translation.zh: 那珍呢？

translation.en: Well, don't worry. I'm gonna tell her I approve your menu choices, which I do.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会告诉她 我同意你的菜单选择 而且事实如此

translation.en: Okay, that was easy.
translation.zh: 好吧 这倒简单

translation.en: Oh, and feel free to use our kitchen.
translation.zh: 请随意使用我们的厨房

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate that.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我很感激

translation.en: -That's it? You're leaving? -Yeah, I have a lot of work to do.
translation.zh: -就这样？你要走了？ -对 我有很多工作

translation.en: Thank you for the peppermint hot chocolate. [Carson] You're welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢你的薄荷热巧克力 -不客气

translation.en: -Bye. -[Molly] Bye.
translation.zh: -再见 -再见

translation.en: Oh, careful with the decorations.
translation.zh: 小心处理装饰品

translation.en: Thanks, just put them over there, and we'll arrange them later.
translation.zh: 谢谢 放在那边 我们待会再整理

translation.en: Hi. Do you need a hand?
translation.zh: 嗨 需要帮忙吗？

translation.en: I think everything is almost in.
translation.zh: 我觉得都差不多了

translation.en: How did it go with the caterers?
translation.zh: 晚宴承办那边怎么样？

translation.en: Oh, good. Yeah, she has fantastic ideas.
translation.zh: 很好 她有很棒的点子

translation.en: We will need at least five different types of cocktail appetizers,
translation.zh: 我们至少需要五种鸡尾酒开胃菜

translation.en: including a vegetarian option for our newest board member, Anne.
translation.zh: 包括一种素食类 因为董事会的新成员安吃素

translation.en: I will let her know.
translation.zh: 我会告诉她的

translation.en: Aunt Jean, look, I don't want you to worry about anything.
translation.zh: 珍姑姑 我希望你不用为任何事操心

translation.en: I promise, it's gonna be fantastic.
translation.zh: 我保证 庆典一定会很精彩

translation.en: Oh, regards to Molly.
translation.zh: 莫莉精神可嘉

translation.en: It was good. But it was not my Grandfather Fred's Christmas fudge.
translation.zh: 软糖很好吃 但比不上我祖父弗雷德的圣诞软糖

translation.en: -What about his Christmas fudge? -Did I never tell you this?
translation.zh: 他的圣诞软糖怎么了？ 我没跟你说过吗？

translation.en: Your great grandfather worked long hours,
translation.zh: 你的曾祖父长时间为工作奔忙 但每年的圣诞节前

translation.en: but every year before Christmas, he would take off a day
translation.zh: 你的曾祖父长时间为工作奔忙 但每年的圣诞节前 他会特意花一天时间 制作独门圣诞核桃软糖

translation.en: to make his Christmas walnut fudge for all us kids.
translation.zh: 他会特意花一天时间 制作独门圣诞核桃软糖 给自己的孩子们享用

translation.en: He lived in York County, Maine, then.
translation.zh: -他当时住在缅因州约克郡 -我以前都不知道

translation.en: I never knew that.
translation.zh: -他当时住在缅因州约克郡 -我以前都不知道 每次趁我爸妈不注意

translation.en: Whenever my parents weren't looking,
translation.zh: 每次趁我爸妈不注意

translation.en: Grandpa would sneak extra fudge to all us kids.
translation.zh: 祖父就会偷偷给我们多塞几块

translation.en: Just thinking about it brings back the fondest memories of my childhood.
translation.zh: 每次想起 就会回到童年最美好的时光

translation.en: Well, 'cause food can be more than just food. Yes, it really can be.
translation.zh: -因为食物可以不仅仅是食物 -是啊 的确如此

translation.en: The art dealer called.
translation.zh: 画商打电话来了

translation.en: The three paintings he's been holding for us have sold.
translation.zh: 他为我们留的那三幅画都卖了

translation.en: Uh, the paintings you were gonna auction off at the Gala?
translation.zh: 你准备在庆典上拍卖的三幅画？

translation.en: Well, I won't be using that gallery again.
translation.zh: 我不会再惠顾那家画廊了

translation.en: He apologizes for the inconvenience
translation.zh: 他很抱歉为你带来不便

translation.en: and hopes you'll find something else for the fundraiser.
translation.zh: 还说希望你能利用其他东西筹款

translation.en: As much as I love the Christmas Gala,
translation.zh: 虽然我很享受圣诞庆典

translation.en: I am not going to miss dealing with all of this when I retire.
translation.zh: 以后退休了 我可不会怀念这些琐事

translation.en: I'll have to call Don, the president of our board.
translation.zh: 我得打给董事会主席唐

translation.en: Robert, you always anticipate my needs.
translation.zh: 罗伯特 你总是预料到我的需求

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: -She's retiring? -Not yet.
translation.zh: 她要退休了？ 还没有 但最近她一直在考虑这件事

translation.en: But she's been thinking a lot about it lately.
translation.zh: 还没有 但最近她一直在考虑这件事

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: No one is gonna come close to filling her shoes.
translation.zh: 根本没人能代替她

translation.en: Especially me, Robert. I'll see you later.
translation.zh: 尤其是我 罗伯特 回头见

translation.en: -Morning. -Hi.
translation.zh: -早上好 -嗨！

translation.en: I thought I'd take you up on your offer
translation.zh: 我想接受你的提议 来借用厨房

translation.en: to use the kitchen, if the chef doesn't mind.
translation.zh: 我想接受你的提议 来借用厨房 -只要主厨不介意就好 -完全没有

translation.en: No, not at all.
translation.zh: -只要主厨不介意就好 -完全没有

translation.en: My aunt had someone leave meals in the fridge for the rest of the day.
translation.zh: 我阿姨请人来过 他们把餐食留在冰箱里了

translation.en: That's efficient.
translation.zh: 真有效率

translation.en: She's surprisingly low maintenance when it comes to herself.
translation.zh: 她自己出奇地不拘小节 -我可没说… -我就是在找你茬

translation.en: -I never said-- -I'm giving you a hard time.
translation.zh: -我可没说… -我就是在找你茬

translation.en: -Can I grab something for you? -Yeah, that'd be great. Thank you.
translation.zh: -我能帮你拿点东西吗？ -行啊 那太好了 谢谢

translation.en: Sorry. I…
translation.zh: 抱歉 我…

translation.en: It's in the back seat.
translation.zh: 在后座

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: You're right about food bringing back memories.
translation.zh: 你说得对 美食能唤起回忆 昨晚我和珍姑姑聊天

translation.en: I was talking to my Aunt Jean last night and she was…
translation.zh: 昨晚我和珍姑姑聊天 她说起她的童年

translation.en: she was telling me about her childhood, and apparently,
translation.zh: 她说起她的童年 显然 我们家出身于缅因州约克郡

translation.en: my family is from York County, Maine.
translation.zh: 显然 我们家出身于缅因州约克郡

translation.en: Maine. Really? That's cool. Did she say anything about the fudge?
translation.zh: 缅因州 真的吗？ 太酷了 她有说过软糖的事吗？

translation.en: She liked it, and she appreciated you tried.
translation.zh: 她很喜欢 谢谢你如此费心

translation.en: I have more recipes.
translation.zh: 我还有好几种食谱

translation.en: That's really sweet of you, literally. But, uh, you don't have to go to the trouble.
translation.zh: 你真贴心 但其实不用麻烦

translation.en: -Feels like a challenge now. -Then I wish you good luck.
translation.zh: -现在感觉像是挑战 -那我祝你好运

translation.en: So, what are we making today?
translation.zh: 我们今天要做什么？

translation.en: Holiday cheesecake bars and almond sugar cookies.
translation.zh: 节日奶酪蛋糕条和杏仁糖饼干

translation.en: Put me to work, if you dare. Are your hands clean?
translation.zh: -如果你有胆量 就给我找点活干 -你的手干净吗？

translation.en: Thank you anyway. I appreciate your getting back to me.
translation.zh: 还是要谢谢你 感谢你回我电话

translation.en: And season's greetings to you too.
translation.zh: 也向你致以节日问候

translation.en: I take it that wasn't good news.
translation.zh: 看来不是好消息咯？

translation.en: Unfortunately, no, it wasn't. Sorry to hear that.
translation.zh: -可惜不是 -我很遗憾

translation.en: I am having zero luck.
translation.zh: 我运气不怎么样

translation.en: Everyone has already donated their big-ticket items for the holiday season.
translation.zh: 大家都已经把节日的大件 捐出去了

translation.en: -Something will turn up. -I hope so.
translation.zh: -会有办法的 -但愿如此

translation.en: -What have you got there? -Oh, it just arrived.
translation.zh: -你拿的是什么？ -刚送到的

translation.en: It's from the children at the Harrison Community Center.
translation.zh: 是哈里森社区中心的孩子们送的

translation.en: Perhaps it'll cheer you up.
translation.zh: 也许它能让你开心起来

translation.en: This is why we do what we do, Robert. This makes it all worthwhile.
translation.zh: 这就是我们努力的动力 罗伯特 这让一切都值得了

translation.en: -I'll have it framed for you, if you like. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 如果你愿意 我就把它装裱起来 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, by the way, have you seen Carson?
translation.zh: 对了 你见到卡森了吗？

translation.en: I've seen not hide nor hair of him all day.
translation.zh: 我一整天都没见过他

translation.en: He is in the kitchen helping the caterer bake Christmas cookies.
translation.zh: 他在厨房帮宴会负责人烤圣诞饼干

translation.en: He's baking? There's a first for everything.
translation.zh: -他在烘焙？ -凡事都有第一次

translation.en: Well, I'm glad he's taking this seriously.
translation.zh: 我很高兴他这么认真对待

translation.en: Maybe it will help him see how much the foundation means.
translation.zh: 也许这能帮助他了解基金会的意义

translation.en: Hopefully.
translation.zh: 希望如此

translation.en: Hope you didn't have to cancel any Christmas plans to do the Gala.
translation.zh: 但愿你没有为圣诞庆典 而取消任何自己的圣诞安排

translation.en: -My family did go on holiday without me. -What?
translation.zh: 我家其他人都去度假了 什么？没带你？

translation.en: They went without you?
translation.zh: 什么？没带你？

translation.en: Yeah, but I needed to stay in town.
translation.zh: 是啊 但我要留在镇子上

translation.en: Making Molly's Menu Magic a success is my number-one priority right now.
translation.zh: 把“莫莉的魔法菜单”做成功 是我现在的头等大事

translation.en: And your significant other?
translation.zh: 你的另一半呢？

translation.en: My significant other is business right now.
translation.zh: 我的事业目前就是我的另一半

translation.en: Well, I can relate to that.
translation.zh: 好吧 我可以理解

translation.en: -Are you close with your family? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你和家人关系好吗？ -很好

translation.en: My parents are still very much in love after all these years.
translation.zh: 结婚这么多年 我父母依旧恩爱

translation.en: You're lucky.
translation.zh: 你很幸运 你也很幸运 你是赫赫有名的哈里森家族成员

translation.en: You're lucky too, you're part of the famous Harrison family.
translation.zh: 你也很幸运 你是赫赫有名的哈里森家族成员

translation.en: -You're like a local celebrity. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你可是当地的名人 是啊

translation.en: I think they think of me as the rebel of the family, though.
translation.zh: 我觉得他们把我视为家中的逆子了

translation.en: -Why is that? -You know, can you…
translation.zh: 为什么？ 你能不能…

translation.en: Braiding cookies is kind of complicated. [laughs]
translation.zh: 饼干编花挺难的 你能帮我一下吗？

translation.en: -Can you give me a hand? -You've almost got it.
translation.zh: 饼干编花挺难的 你能帮我一下吗？ 你弄得差不多的

translation.en: -Wow, I don't know. -Here. Okay.
translation.zh: -等一下 -来吧 好了

translation.en: -The left goes over the middle. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 左边那条在中间

translation.en: And then the right goes over the middle.
translation.zh: 然后右边的放中间 尽量不要把面团弄扁

translation.en: -Try not to flatten the dough. -Right.
translation.zh: 然后右边的放中间 尽量不要把面团弄扁 好

translation.en: -There you go. -Kinda like that?
translation.zh: 没错 -像这样？ -对

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: -像这样？ -对

translation.en: -Okay. -Perfect.
translation.zh: -好 -完美

translation.en: -And then you bend the top. -Like that?
translation.zh: -然后把上面弄弯 -像这样吗？

translation.en: It's a tri-color candy cane. You're a genius.
translation.zh: 这就是三色拐杖糖！你真是天才

translation.en: Well, not quite, but I'll take it.
translation.zh: 并不算是 但我接受

translation.en: Hey, I saw that.
translation.zh: 嘿！我看到了

translation.en: No, I said you're a genius. Mm, these are really good.
translation.zh: 我说了 你是天才 这些真的很棒

translation.en: I see what you're doing. Your charm will not work on me.
translation.zh: 我知道你在做什么 你的魅力对我没用

translation.en: You think I'm charming?
translation.zh: 你觉得我有魅力吗？

translation.en: -I'm not gonna tell you what I think. -Okay, I won't ask then.
translation.zh: -我不会告诉你我的想法 -那我就不问了

translation.en: -What's next? -Okay.
translation.zh: 接下来呢？ 把那个放到盘子上

translation.en: That goes on the tray, and then we'll sprinkle it
translation.zh: 把那个放到盘子上 我们要撒上我的超级秘制饼干调料

translation.en: with my super secret cookie seasoning.
translation.zh: 我们要撒上我的超级秘制饼干调料

translation.en: Super secret, do tell?
translation.zh: 超级秘制？说说嘛

translation.en: The secret is in the blend, and that I will never tell.
translation.zh: 秘密就在混合配方中 我永远不会说

translation.en: -I'll get it out of you somehow. -No, never.
translation.zh: -我一定会套出来 -休想

translation.en: It's empty. I'll refill.
translation.zh: -里面是空的 -我再装

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: Christina used the rest, and this was the last container.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜肯定把剩下的用掉了 这是最后一份了

translation.en: Can you make more?
translation.zh: 你能再做一些吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but I'll have to go to the countryside.
translation.zh: 可以 但我得去乡下

translation.en: -If I leave now, I might have time. -I'll get my keys.
translation.zh: -如果我现在出发 可能还来得及 -我去拿钥匙

translation.en: I'm sure you're busy. I could have driven myself.
translation.zh: 你一定很忙 我可以自己开车

translation.en: It's no problem. I love a new adventure.
translation.zh: 没关系 我喜欢新的冒险

translation.en: Is that what makes you the outsider of the family?
translation.zh: 你就是这样成为家中局外人的吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Probably.
translation.zh: 可能吧

translation.en: You and your aunt seem close. Oh, we are.
translation.zh: -你和你姑姑似乎很亲近 -的确

translation.en: Aunt Jean never had children of her own,
translation.zh: 珍姑姑自己没有子女

translation.en: but she always treated me like I was her son.
translation.zh: 但她一直对我视如己出

translation.en: -It's nice that you have each other. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你们能有彼此真好 的确

translation.en: Yeah, it is.
translation.zh: 的确

translation.en: Though, sometimes I think she wishes I was more like my cousins.
translation.zh: 我觉得她希望我能更像我的表亲那样

translation.en: They all went to Ivy League Schools, earned their MBAs,
translation.zh: 他们上常春藤名校 攻读MBA学位

translation.en: work for the foundation.
translation.zh: 为基金会效力

translation.en: I imagine it would be hard not having separation
translation.zh: 我想一定很难

translation.en: between family and the family business.
translation.zh: 把家庭与家族生意分开

translation.en: Yeah, especially when you're a Harrison.
translation.zh: 是啊 尤其如果你是哈里森家族的人

translation.en: Professionally, I go by Jacob, my middle name. Makes it easier.
translation.zh: 专业领域内 我用教名雅各布 这样比较简单

translation.en: The Harrison name is so renowned. Doesn't it make you proud?
translation.zh: 哈里森的名号那么响亮 你不觉得很自豪吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, I'm really proud.
translation.zh: 对 我是很自豪

translation.en: But…
translation.zh: 不过…当人们发现你姓哈里森

translation.en: when people find out you're a Harrison, they treat you differently.
translation.zh: 不过…当人们发现你姓哈里森 就会对你另眼相看

translation.en: That's partly why I didn't tell you who I was when I met you in the kitchen.
translation.zh: 所以在厨房初次见到你时 我才没有告诉你

translation.en: I wonder what you would have done if you knew who I was.
translation.zh: 我不知道如果你知道你会怎么做

translation.en: -I would have kicked you out. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 把你踢出去

translation.en: Fair enough.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We need to make a quick detour.
translation.zh: 我们需要快速绕个道

translation.en: Wow, how did you know this was here?
translation.zh: 哇 你怎么知道这里有这种地方？

translation.en: Well, I drove past it the other day.
translation.zh: 之前我开车路过这里

translation.en: So did I. I never saw it.
translation.zh: 我也是 但我就没看到

translation.en: It's beautiful.
translation.zh: 很漂亮

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, it is.
translation.zh: 是啊 的确

translation.en: Sometimes it's nice to just slow down.
translation.zh: 有时候慢下来也不错

translation.en: I worry about the future so much,
translation.zh: 我总是非常担心未来

translation.en: I have to remind myself to just be here in the present moment.
translation.zh: 我必须提醒自己活在当下

translation.en: It's one of the first things to learn about photography,
translation.zh: 这是我对摄影最早的心得之一

translation.en: to just stop and look so I could really see.
translation.zh: 停下来仔细观察…这样才能真正看到

translation.en: It's actually good advice.
translation.zh: 这是好建议

translation.en: Sometimes I'm so focused on building my career,
translation.zh: 有时候我太专注于经营事业

translation.en: I forget why I got into it in the first place.
translation.zh: 都忘了入行的初衷

translation.en: Why did you?
translation.zh: 你为什么入行？

translation.en: For my love of food, and bringing people together.
translation.zh: 我对食物的热爱 还有拉近人与人的距离

translation.en: That's nice.
translation.zh: 真不错

translation.en: May I?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: Uh… sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.zh: 真美

translation.en: What did you say?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: Nothing, it's just a beautiful day.
translation.zh: 没什么 今天天气很好

translation.en: -Thomas! -[Thomas laughs] -Hi. -You made it.
translation.zh: -托马斯！嗨！ -你来了！

translation.en: -It's nice to see you. -You too.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你 -我也是

translation.en: -Who is your friend? -This is Carson.
translation.zh: -你的朋友什么来头？ -这位是卡森

translation.en: Thomas is an old friend and veteran.
translation.zh: 托马斯是我的老朋友 一位老兵

translation.en: It's very good to meet you, sir, and thank you for your service.
translation.zh: 幸会 先生 感谢你尽忠效力

translation.en: Appreciate it. Just working on your order.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 我正忙活你的订单呢

translation.en: -I'll ring the bell when it's ready. -Great.
translation.zh: -等准备好了 我会打给你 -太好了

translation.en: Sir, do you mind if I take some photographs of your property?
translation.zh: 介意我在你这里拍点照片吗？

translation.en: He's a professional photographer.
translation.zh: 他是专业摄影师

translation.en: Sure. Go ahead. Anything but the shed.
translation.zh: 行啊 拍吧 拍什么都行 棚屋就别拍了 乱得很

translation.en: -It's a mess. -Fair enough.
translation.zh: 行啊 拍吧 拍什么都行 棚屋就别拍了 乱得很 -好吧 -需要帮忙吗？

translation.en: -Do you need any help? -No, I got it.
translation.zh: -好吧 -需要帮忙吗？ 没事 我搞得定

translation.en: You might keep an eye on your young man, make sure he doesn't wander too far.
translation.zh: 看好你的男人 别让他乱跑

translation.en: Oh, no, no. We're not together. He's an employer.
translation.zh: 不 我们没在交往 他是一位雇主

translation.en: Oh, all right, then. All right.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: -Thanks. -See you in a bit.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -一会见

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 -这里好美啊

translation.en: It's so beautiful here, especially during Christmas.
translation.zh: -嘿 -这里好美啊 -尤其到了圣诞节 -的确

translation.en: Yeah. It really is.
translation.zh: -尤其到了圣诞节 -的确

translation.en: -So how do you know Thomas? -We always got our Christmas tree here.
translation.zh: -你怎么认识托马斯的？ -我们一直在这里买圣诞树

translation.en: His wife used to run the farmer's market in the village.
translation.zh: 他的妻子曾经在村里经营农贸市场

translation.en: When she passed, he got rid of the shop, and now he sells everything from his house.
translation.zh: 她去世后 他关掉了商铺 现如今 他在家里卖东西

translation.en: -Well, he seems like a really nice guy. -He is.
translation.zh: -他看起来人很不错 -他人很好

translation.en: And you will not find better spices or herbs anywhere,
translation.zh: 而且 你在别处找不到 比这里更好的香料或香草

translation.en: or Christmas trees.
translation.zh: 或者圣诞树

translation.en: Yeah, they are… they're really beautiful.
translation.zh: 是的 它们…确实很漂亮

translation.en: -That looks complicated. -Uh…
translation.zh: 那东西看起来挺复杂 的确需要花点时间习惯

translation.en: It takes some getting used to, for sure, um…
translation.zh: 的确需要花点时间习惯

translation.en: But I have another camera. Wanna take some photos?
translation.zh: 但我有另一台相机 想拍照吗？

translation.en: -Uh, sure. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好啊 -嗯

translation.en: "On," point, shoot, easy.
translation.zh: 打开 对准 拍照 简单

translation.en: How did I do?
translation.zh: 我拍得如何？

translation.en: It's actually really good. You got an eye for this. You're an artist after all.
translation.zh: 很好 你有摄影眼光 不愧是艺术家

translation.en: Well, food can be artistic, but I wouldn't necessarily call it art.
translation.zh: 食物可以具有艺术性 我可能不会称之为艺术

translation.en: Well, it incorporates all of the senses.
translation.zh: 它结合了各种感官

translation.en: Okay, I'll give you that.
translation.zh: 这点我同意

translation.en: Not to mention the plating and presentation aspects.
translation.zh: 更别说摆盘和呈现方面

translation.en: Wow. You know more about catering than you've let on.
translation.zh: 你比表面上看起来更懂餐饮呢

translation.en: I might have done a little bit of research this week.
translation.zh: 我这周可能做了一些功课

translation.en: I'm impressed.
translation.zh: 佩服

translation.en: -Good. -[triangle clanging]
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: That's probably us. We should probably head back.
translation.zh: 可能是叫我们呢 我们大概应该回去了

translation.en: Yeah, let's do it. Lead the way.
translation.zh: 是啊 走吧 请带路

translation.en: -Hope you got some good pictures. -Oh, I did.
translation.zh: -但愿你拍到了好照片 -拍到了

translation.en: In fact, uh, when I print them out, would you like some copies?
translation.zh: 冲印出来后 你想要几张吗？

translation.en: I'd like that.
translation.zh: 我很乐意

translation.en: -How much do I owe you? -I got this.
translation.zh: -我该付你多少钱？ -让我来吧

translation.en: It's okay, I can get it. No, it's for the Gala.
translation.zh: -没关系 我可以的 -不 这是为了庆典

translation.en: And this way I know you won't up-charge me.
translation.zh: 这样我才知道你不会多收我钱

translation.en: Uh, no change necessary, sir. Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 不需要找了 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Well, that's mighty generous of you. Merry Christmas to you both.
translation.zh: 你真慷慨 祝你们圣诞快乐

translation.en: -Let me take this to the car. -Sure.
translation.zh: -我把这个拿去车上 -好啊

translation.en: -Your employer, you say? -Yep.
translation.zh: 你说是雇主？ 对

translation.en: So my aunt was just telling me that the Harrison Foundation holds
translation.zh: 我姑姑之前刚告诉我 哈里森基金会每周 都为退伍军人举办活动

translation.en: events every week in town for veterans.
translation.zh: 哈里森基金会每周 都为退伍军人举办活动

translation.en: -You don't say? -Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -对

translation.en: That's her card.
translation.zh: 这是她的名片

translation.en: There's meals, entertainment, and they got a holiday festival coming up.
translation.zh: 有餐食 娱乐项目 近期还有节日活动

translation.en: Should check it out. They'd love your company.
translation.zh: 去看看吧 他们一定乐意让你加入

translation.en: I might just do that. Happy holidays, Thomas.
translation.zh: -我也许会去呢 -节日快乐 托马斯

translation.en: Thanks, guys. Bye-bye.
translation.zh: 谢谢 再见

translation.en: -Thank you. -Bye.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -再见

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 干嘛？

translation.en: You might be a better ambassador for your family's foundation than you think.
translation.zh: 你可能比自己想的 更适合当基金会的大使

translation.en: Sounds like you and Carson had fun.
translation.zh: 听起来你和卡森玩得很开心嘛

translation.en: Surprisingly, it was a lot of fun.
translation.zh: 出乎预料 的确很开心

translation.en: Is he single? It's strictly a professional relationship.
translation.zh: -他是单身吗？ -我跟他只是工作关系

translation.en: Even if I was interested, which I'm not, he lives his life out of a suitcase.
translation.zh: 我没兴趣 就算我有 他成天拉着行李箱四处跑

translation.en: So? People make long-distance relationships work all the time.
translation.zh: 异地恋成功的大有人在

translation.en: Okay, but if you're not on the same page, or in the same place,
translation.zh: 好吧 但如果想法不一致 或者不在一个地方

translation.en: it can only end in heartbreak.
translation.zh: 最后只会以心碎收场

translation.en: Hey, Carson isn't Phil, okay?
translation.zh: 卡森不是菲尔 好吧？

translation.en: He's not gonna string you along with empty promises.
translation.zh: 他不会总是用空头许诺钓着你

translation.en: I know, but I'm not willing to make the same mistake twice.
translation.zh: 我知道 但我不想重蹈覆辙 既然没有未来 就不要投入进去

translation.en: There's no point in getting involved if there's no future.
translation.zh: 既然没有未来 就不要投入进去

translation.en: Besides, we have nothing in common.
translation.zh: 我们没有任何共同点

translation.en: Why would you say that?
translation.zh: 你为什么这么说？

translation.en: He is a trust fund baby, and I've been working since I was 15.
translation.zh: 他是基金会家族宝宝 而我从15岁就开始工作了

translation.en: If I fail, I lose everything. There's no safety net.
translation.zh: 如果我失败了 我会失去一切 没有安全网

translation.en: Uh, we're not going to fail.
translation.zh: 我们不会失败的

translation.en: This Gala is going to be the making of Molly's Menu Magic.
translation.zh: 这场庆典将成就“莫莉的魔法菜单”

translation.en: That is the goal.
translation.zh: 这就是目标

translation.en: Tomorrow we're prepping the main courses.
translation.zh: 明天我们开始准备主菜

translation.en: Oh, did you hear that the Bradford Bros. snagged City Hall's New Year's Eve party?
translation.zh: 你有没有听说 “布拉福德兄弟” 拿到了市政厅除夕派对的大订单？

translation.en: Yes. All the more reason this has to go perfectly.
translation.zh: 是啊 因此我们更要做到尽善尽美

translation.en: Aren't you coming? I found a new fudge recipe I wanna try.
translation.zh: -你不一起走吗？ -我找到一份新的软糖食谱 我想试试

translation.en: -Is it for Jean, again? -Yes.
translation.zh: -又是为了珍吗？ -是的

translation.en: Even if I have to attempt it a hundred times, I will get it right.
translation.zh: 就算要尝试100次 我也要做出来

translation.en: Well, I really hope it doesn't take that many times.
translation.zh: 但愿不会需要那么多次

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: -祝你好运 -谢谢

translation.en: -Thanks. I'll see you in the morning. -Good night.
translation.zh: -明早见 -晚安

translation.en: Molly, hello. What can I do for you?
translation.zh: 你好 莫莉 有什么事吗？

translation.en: I have something for you to try.
translation.zh: 我给您准备了点东西尝尝

translation.en: You are so kind continuing to attempt to re-create it.
translation.zh: 你真好 一直不断尝试把它做出来

translation.en: This time I used an old-fashioned recipe using brown sugar.
translation.zh: 我用红糖做了一款传统的

translation.en: Go ahead and take a piece.
translation.zh: 来吧 拿一块

translation.en: Here's hoping.
translation.zh: 愿你成功

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 您觉得怎么样？

translation.en: It's delicious, but it's not my grandfather's.
translation.zh: 很好吃 但这不是我祖父做的味道

translation.en: I'll keep trying to make it work. Maybe it's the cocoa powder.
translation.zh: 我会继续努力 也许是可可粉的问题

translation.en: Your time is valuable.
translation.zh: 你的时间很宝贵

translation.en: You don't need to waste any more of it
translation.zh: 没必要花费更多时间

translation.en: on further fruitless attempts to please me.
translation.zh: 为取悦我而做无谓尝试

translation.en: I don't mind.
translation.zh: 我不介意

translation.en: I have news.
translation.zh: 我有消息告诉你

translation.en: I can tell by the look on your face that it isn't good.
translation.zh: 从你的表情判断 应该不是好消息

translation.en: What is it this time? Molly, please, wait.
translation.zh: 怎么了？莫莉 请稍等

translation.en: Pierre phoned. He wishes he could help, and he apologizes,
translation.zh: 皮埃尔来电话 他很想帮忙 但只能致歉

translation.en: but the sculpture won't be ready until after the Gala.
translation.zh: 雕塑赶不及在庆典前制作完成

translation.en: There goes that idea.
translation.zh: 那这个想法也泡汤了

translation.en: Robert, do you still have the number for that antique restorer?
translation.zh: 罗伯特 你还有那位古董修复师的电话吗？

translation.en: Susan?
translation.zh: 苏珊？莎拉？

translation.en: -Sarah? -Sutton.
translation.zh: 苏珊？莎拉？ -萨顿 萨顿·佩奇 -就是她

translation.en: -Sutton Paige? -Yes, that's the one.
translation.zh: -萨顿 萨顿·佩奇 -就是她

translation.en: Perhaps she has some antiques she would donate.
translation.zh: 也许她有古董可以捐

translation.en: -I'll get it right away. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -我马上去找 -谢谢

translation.en: Now, Molly, Carson showed me your menu this morning.
translation.zh: 莫莉 卡森今早给我看了你的菜单

translation.en: I hope he's being helpful. Yes, very helpful.
translation.zh: -我希望他有帮上忙 -是的 他帮了很多

translation.en: Good. This is the first time that he's participated
translation.zh: 很好 这是他第一次参与

translation.en: in any of our foundation's events, so I'm glad to hear it.
translation.zh: 我们的活动筹划 所以很高兴听你这样说

translation.en: I have made some changes to the menu.
translation.zh: 我对菜单做了一些修改

translation.en: Oh, right, of course. No problem at all.
translation.zh: 当然 没问题

translation.en: Wonderful.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: We have a problem.
translation.zh: 我们有麻烦了

translation.en: Jean would like beef Wellington instead of the prime rib entrée.
translation.zh: 珍想要威灵顿牛柳做主菜 而不是上等牛肋

translation.en: Nix the ricotta meatballs. We can use them for the McCue lunch?
translation.zh: 取消意大利乳清干酪肉丸 我们可以用它做麦考家的午餐

translation.en: She saw the candy cane dessert and would prefer we do not serve those
translation.zh: 她看到了糖果拐杖甜品 说最好不要用这款

translation.en: because they do not look professional.
translation.zh: 因为看起来不够专业

translation.en: I mean, they haven't even been baked or decorated yet.
translation.zh: 那些都还没有进行烘焙或装饰呢

translation.en: -[sighs] She's something else. -Who's something else?
translation.zh: -她可真不是一般人 -谁不是一般人？

translation.en: I'll call you back.
translation.zh: 我再打给你

translation.en: Hi. Sorry to interrupt.
translation.zh: 嗨 抱歉打扰

translation.en: Uh… I thought you approved the menu.
translation.zh: 我以为你批准了菜单

translation.en: Oh, I did. Why?
translation.zh: 没错啊 怎么了？

translation.en: I'll talk to her. She put me in charge, she needs to trust me.
translation.zh: 我会跟她谈谈 她让我负责 那就得相信我

translation.en: No, I don't wanna cause any trouble. I'll do whatever she wants. It's fine.
translation.zh: 我不想惹麻烦 我会照她说的做

translation.en: I don't know why the menu's such a big deal anyway.
translation.zh: 我不明白 菜单的事有何大不了的 无论你主菜上什么美味 大家一定会喜欢的

translation.en: Everyone's gonna love whatever delicious entrée you make.
translation.zh: 无论你主菜上什么美味 大家一定会喜欢的

translation.en: And I didn't spend all that time braiding those cookies not to serve them.
translation.zh: 我费了那么多功夫编饼干 可不是为了不让人吃

translation.en: -Seriously, don't worry about it. -No. I don't think you understand.
translation.zh: -别担心 -不 我觉得你不明白

translation.en: This dinner and Jean Harrison's opinion, it can make or break my career.
translation.zh: 这次的晚宴和珍·哈里森的意见 可能关乎我事业的生死

translation.en: I love my aunt.
translation.zh: 我爱我的姑姑

translation.en: But she runs one wonderful but, in the grand scheme of things,
translation.zh: 但她经营的是一个很棒的基金会 但从宏观看来 也是规模很小的基金会

translation.en: relatively small foundation.
translation.zh: 但从宏观看来 也是规模很小的基金会

translation.en: I don't know why people make a big deal of one person's opinion, to be honest.
translation.zh: 我不明白 为什么所有人 都这么看重她的意见

translation.en: Okay, I know you grew up with it,
translation.zh: 好吧 我知道你在这个家族长大

translation.en: but do you know anything about your family's foundation?
translation.zh: 但你对家族的基金会有了解吗？

translation.en: Well… Just…
translation.zh: 就是…

translation.en: Come with me. Where are we going?
translation.zh: -跟我来 -我们要去哪里？

translation.en: You'll see. This time, you have to trust me.
translation.zh: 一会就知道了 这次你得相信我

translation.en: -All right, but I'm driving. -Fine, my car's a mess.
translation.zh: -好吧 但我来开车 -好吧 我的车里乱得很

translation.en: I'll get my coat!
translation.zh: 我去拿外套

translation.en: At some point, you are gonna have to tell me where we're going.
translation.zh: 你总要告诉我咱们要去哪里吧

translation.en: The Harrison Community Center. Have you been recently?
translation.zh: 哈里森社区中心 你最近去过吗？

translation.en: You know, I don't think I've ever been inside. Really?
translation.zh: -我好像没进去过 -真的吗？

translation.en: Well, that answer is about to change.
translation.zh: 这个答案就要改变了

translation.en: I spent many, many hours here as a kid.
translation.zh: 我小时候在这里度过了许多时光

translation.en: You did?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: [Molly] Ahh! I love your costume!
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的服装

translation.en: -Christmas ballerina! -Wow!
translation.zh: -圣诞舞者 -哇！

translation.en: Excellent twirling. Very well done.
translation.zh: 转得真漂亮 干得好

translation.en: So, all the kids here, it's just for the holiday,
translation.zh: 这些孩子只是来这里过节

translation.en: or is this a regular thing?
translation.zh: 还是平日也常来？

translation.en: The Harrison Community Center offers after-school, weekend,
translation.zh: 哈里森社区中心 提供课后、周末和假日托儿服务

translation.en: holiday care for all kids. Everyone's welcome, and it's free.
translation.zh: 这里欢迎所有人 而且服务免费

translation.en: Wow, they are so creative.
translation.zh: 他们很有创意

translation.en: You mind if I help? Need a hand?
translation.zh: 介意我帮忙吗？需要帮忙吗？

translation.en: Hold it there.
translation.zh: 抓住这里

translation.en: And then you can, with the other hand, grab that. Nice!
translation.zh: 然后你可以 用另一只手抓住那里 不错！

translation.en: This is actually where I learned about royal icing and piping techniques.
translation.zh: 我就是在这里 学会做糖霜酥皮和嵌边技巧的

translation.en: -You learned that here? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你在这里学的？

translation.en: Ms. Zona was the wonderful cookie teacher who taught us.
translation.zh: 佐娜女士是位好老师 是她教我们的

translation.en: She was the best. She's the reason why I became a baker.
translation.zh: 她是最棒的 因为她 我才成为烘焙师

translation.en: Hi, Molly. [laughs]
translation.zh: 嗨 莫莉

translation.en: Amber runs Bendell Bakery, and she volunteers here on her days off.
translation.zh: 安珀是班德尔面包店的老板 休息时来这里做义工

translation.en: -Hi, Amber. -Hi.
translation.zh: -你好 安珀 -你好

translation.en: Well, Molly and I, we switch off weekends.
translation.zh: 莫莉和我周末休息

translation.en: But she hosts a cooking class for the kids in her very own kitchen.
translation.zh: 但她在自家厨房里给孩子们上烹饪课

translation.en: She's pretty fantastic.
translation.zh: 她很厉害

translation.en: -Yes, she is. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 的确如此 我马上回来

translation.en: I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我马上回来

translation.en: Growing up, both my parents worked,
translation.zh: 我从小到大 父母都要上班

translation.en: so my brothers and I spent almost every day here.
translation.zh: 所以我和家中兄弟几乎天天都来这里

translation.en: The money they saved helped put us through college.
translation.zh: 父母存下的钱供我们读完了大学

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: I really am so grateful to your family. We all are.
translation.zh: 我真的很感谢你的家人 我们都是

translation.en: Thank you for sharing that with me.
translation.zh: 谢谢你告诉我这些

translation.en: Whoa. Oh! Sorry.
translation.zh: -哇 抱歉 -嘿

translation.en: Hey, Stephen would like to give you something.
translation.zh: 斯蒂芬想送你点东西

translation.en: Would you like a Christmas cookie? Uh, don't mind if I do.
translation.zh: -你想吃圣诞饼干吗？ -我不介意

translation.en: Can I take that one? Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -我能拿这块吗？谢谢 -是你上的糖霜吗？

translation.en: Did you ice these? Are you sure?
translation.zh: -我能拿这块吗？谢谢 -是你上的糖霜吗？ 你确定吗？装饰得很专业呢

translation.en: They look professionally decorated.
translation.zh: 你确定吗？装饰得很专业呢

translation.en: Yes, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 是的 我确定

translation.en: Wow. That…
translation.zh: 哇 年轻人 这是我吃过

translation.en: That is one of the best Christmas cookies I've ever had, young man.
translation.zh: 哇 年轻人 这是我吃过 最美味的圣诞饼干之一

translation.en: And the icing is perfect.
translation.zh: 糖霜很完美

translation.en: I've been decorating cookies since I was a little kid.
translation.zh: 我从小就会装饰饼干

translation.en: Well, you keep up the good work, the great work.
translation.zh: 继续努力 干得漂亮

translation.en: I… I didn't catch your name.
translation.zh: 我刚没记住你的名字

translation.en: -It's Carson. -Carson?
translation.zh: -我叫卡森 -卡森？

translation.en: -As in a Harrison? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 哈里森家那位？

translation.en: I can't begin to tell you how thankful we all are to your family
translation.zh: 我简直无法对你表达 我们大家对你们家族的感激之情

translation.en: for everything that they've done for the town!
translation.zh: 我们大家对你们家族的感激之情

translation.en: From the center, to the arts program in the school.
translation.zh: 中心也好 学校的人文课程也好…

translation.en: Well… really, for everything. Your family is the best!
translation.zh: 真的 你们所做的一切 你们家族太赞了

translation.en: -I mean, I could go on and on. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -简直说也说不完… -谢谢

translation.en: -Thanks. -Okay, well, I should…
translation.zh: -简直说也说不完… -谢谢 嗯…我还是…

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 嗯…我还是…

translation.en: Come back again soon!
translation.zh: -有空再来玩！ -好的

translation.en: -Yeah! -Merry Christmas! -Bye! -Merry Christmas!
translation.zh: -圣诞快乐！ -圣诞快乐！

translation.en: -Happy holidays. -Bye.
translation.zh: -节日快乐 -再见

translation.en: -Thank you very much. -Okay.
translation.zh: -再见 -非常感谢

translation.en: Come again. And that is what happens when people find out I'm a Harrison around here.
translation.zh: 当人们发现我姓哈里森时 就会发生这种事

translation.en: This isn't about you, it's about the Harrison Foundation,
translation.zh: 重点不是你 关键是哈里森基金会 他们为许多孩子做了很多善事

translation.en: all the good they do for so many kids.
translation.zh: 关键是哈里森基金会 他们为许多孩子做了很多善事

translation.en: No, I get that, but my entire life,
translation.zh: 我明白 但我从小到大

translation.en: all anyone ever talked about was the Harrison Foundation.
translation.zh: 大家谈论的都是哈里森基金会

translation.en: I felt like everything was mapped out for me, especially by Aunt Jean.
translation.zh: 感觉一切都计划好了 尤其是珍姑姑

translation.en: Okay. I wouldn't like that either, feeling like I don't have a choice.
translation.zh: 好吧 我也不希望这样 感觉我别无选择

translation.en: Yeah, that's why I bought that camera, that plane ticket.
translation.zh: 所以我才买了那台相机和机票

translation.en: I had to get out before I got trapped.
translation.zh: 我得在被困之前挣脱出去

translation.en: Well, you have a great career doing what you love.
translation.zh: 你以趣为业 做得有声有色

translation.en: I understand not wanting to give that up.
translation.zh: 我理解你不想放弃

translation.en: I loved it in the beginning
translation.zh: 一开始 我很喜欢

translation.en: when I was caught up in the excitement of that kinda life.
translation.zh: 一开始 我很喜欢 那种生活的刺激令我沉迷

translation.en: But now…
translation.zh: 然而现在…

translation.en: Now?
translation.zh: 现在呢？

translation.en: You wanna go get a hot cider?
translation.zh: 你想喝热果饮吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Sure, I have time. Let's go to Nick's Café.
translation.zh: -好啊 我有时间 -我们去尼克咖啡厅

translation.en: -Nick's? -Nick's.
translation.zh: -尼克？ -尼克

translation.en: -Seriously, thank you so much for today. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: 今天真的很感谢你 -不客气 -嗯

translation.en: Yeah. I'm ashamed to say that I've seen the financial reports,
translation.zh: -不客气 -嗯 说来惭愧 我看过财务报告

translation.en: but that is the first time that I've seen people directly benefiting
translation.zh: 但今天才第一次接触 家族基金会的直接受益者

translation.en: from my family's foundation.
translation.zh: 家族基金会的直接受益者

translation.en: It was something.
translation.zh: 感觉很特别

translation.en: You were great with the kids. Like it or not, I think you're a natural.
translation.zh: 你很擅长与孩子相处 我觉得你天生适合做这个

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Enough about me; did you always wanna be a chef and caterer?
translation.zh: 不说我了 一直以来 你都想做主厨搞餐饮吗？

translation.en: Yeah, when I was a kid, I used to have Christmas tea parties
translation.zh: 我小时候 过家家喜欢跟洋娃娃和恐龙

translation.en: with my dolls and dinosaurs.
translation.zh: 一起玩圣诞茶会 恐龙参加圣诞茶会？

translation.en: Dinosaurs? At a Christmas tea party?
translation.zh: 恐龙参加圣诞茶会？

translation.en: T-Rex would have three helpings, which is the greatest compliment for a cook.
translation.zh: 霸王龙会吃三四份 这对主厨而言是最大的赞美

translation.en: -Was probably the best meal of his life. -It was.
translation.zh: -他可能从未吃过这种美味 -没错

translation.en: I hope your aunt feels the same way.
translation.zh: 我希望你姑姑也有同感

translation.en: Look, please do not stress about her. I'm gonna be with you every step of the way, I promise.
translation.zh: 请不要因为她压力过大 这一路有我和你一起

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Isabella, my agent.
translation.zh: 我的经纪人伊莎贝拉

translation.en: We've talked so much about me and the foundation,
translation.zh: 我们聊了很多关于我和基金会的事 我真的很想…

translation.en: -I really wanna… -[chiming resumes]
translation.zh: 我们聊了很多关于我和基金会的事 我真的很想… 抱歉

translation.en: No, she's… not extremely patient.
translation.zh: 没有 她不是很有耐心

translation.en: Probably makes her a great agent.
translation.zh: -所以可能是不错的经纪人 -没关系

translation.en: That's okay. We should get going anyway.
translation.zh: -所以可能是不错的经纪人 -没关系 我们该走了 我一直让克里斯蒂娜顶着

translation.en: I left Christina holding down the fort.
translation.zh: 我们该走了 我一直让克里斯蒂娜顶着

translation.en: I guess we should.
translation.zh: 是该走了

translation.en: Oh, Carson, give me some advice.
translation.zh: 卡森 给我点建议

translation.en: Do you think that candle should be over there?
translation.zh: 你觉得蜡烛应该放在那边吗？

translation.en: -Balance? -Uh…
translation.zh: 平衡吗？

translation.en: No. No, I think it looks great.
translation.zh: 不 我觉得很棒

translation.en: How are plans going for the dinner?
translation.zh: 晚宴安排怎么样了？

translation.en: It's great. She's great.
translation.zh: 很顺利 她很优秀

translation.en: Everything is going to be… oh, what's the word I'm looking for?
translation.zh: 一切都会…我该怎么说呢？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. -Great. -Great.
translation.zh: -对了 很顺利 -很顺利

translation.en: I know this isn't how you would choose to spend your time at home,
translation.zh: 我知道 你不想这样度过在家的时光

translation.en: but I do appreciate the help.
translation.zh: 但我很感激你的帮助

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然 老实说

translation.en: To tell you the truth, catering, event planning, it's kind of fun.
translation.zh: 当然 老实说 晚宴和活动策划…都挺有趣的

translation.en: This is the first year we won't have a silent auction.
translation.zh: 这是我们头一年不举行无声拍卖

translation.en: -What about the antiques? -I'm afraid that didn't work out.
translation.zh: -那古董呢？ -没安排成

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 好可惜

translation.en: It is what it is.
translation.zh: 这也没办法

translation.en: We will get through the best we can, as always.
translation.zh: 我们会一如既往尽力而为

translation.en: -There has to be other places-- -It's too late in the year.
translation.zh: -肯定还有其他… -来不及了 为时太晚 人们都已经去度假了

translation.en: People are already gone for the holidays.
translation.zh: 为时太晚 人们都已经去度假了

translation.en: It's been a long day.
translation.zh: 今天很漫长 我很累 先去睡了

translation.en: I'm tired, I'm gonna turn in. Good night.
translation.zh: 今天很漫长 我很累 先去睡了 -晚安 -晚安

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: -晚安 -晚安

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: You taking that up for Aunt Jean?
translation.zh: 这是给珍姑姑准备的？她还好吗？

translation.en: -Is she feeling okay? -Oh, don't worry, she's not ill.
translation.zh: 这是给珍姑姑准备的？她还好吗？ 别担心 她没生病

translation.en: I think it's just all the stress of the Gala.
translation.zh: 可能就是因为庆典压力太大
