translation.en: A couple more days, it'll be over for another year.
translation.zh: 再过几天 就是新的一年了

translation.en: Carson, Jean has devoted her entire life to this foundation
translation.zh: 卡森 珍把一生都奉献给这个基金会

translation.en: and to serving the people of the community.
translation.zh: 服务这个社区

translation.en: She deserves to be catered to now and then.
translation.zh: 偶尔也理应得到照顾

translation.en: I appreciate how much you care.
translation.zh: 你如此用心 我很感激

translation.en: It's impossible for anyone who knows your aunt not to care about her.
translation.zh: 但凡是了解你姑姑的人 都一定会关心她

translation.en: It is rare to meet someone who is so genuinely selfless.
translation.zh: 你很少会遇到如此… 赤诚无私的人

translation.en: Now, if you'll excuse me.
translation.zh: 失陪一下

translation.en: Robert, she's lucky to have you.
translation.zh: 罗伯特 有你在 她很幸运

translation.en: Thank you for saying so.
translation.zh: 谢谢你这么说

translation.en: Now, I need to call a few more auction houses, see if I can find anything at all.
translation.zh: 我需要再打给几家拍卖行 看看能不能找到什么

translation.en: That's a good idea.
translation.zh: 好主意

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨 嗨 我好几天没见你了

translation.en: I haven't seen you for a few days.
translation.zh: 嗨 我好几天没见你了

translation.en: I've been prepping at my place with Christina.
translation.zh: 我和克里斯蒂娜一起在家做准备 我有把进展消息发给你的

translation.en: -I sent you updates. -Oh, I know.
translation.zh: 我和克里斯蒂娜一起在家做准备 我有把进展消息发给你的 我知道 我只是更喜欢当面跟进

translation.en: I just like getting the updates in person better.
translation.zh: 我知道 我只是更喜欢当面跟进 我们进展得很顺利 比计划还提早了呢

translation.en: Well, we're in good shape. Ahead of schedule, actually.
translation.zh: 我们进展得很顺利 比计划还提早了呢

translation.en: -Good. -I just came to drop a few things off.
translation.zh: -很好 -我来送几样东西

translation.en: I have a second cooler, if you wouldn't mind.
translation.zh: 车上还有个冰镇箱 不介意帮忙拿一下吧

translation.en: Oh, of course not.
translation.zh: 当然不介意

translation.en: How's Jean feeling?
translation.zh: 珍感觉怎么样？

translation.en: Oh, better. I think she was just upset 'cause of the silent auction.
translation.zh: 好多了 可能是 因为无声拍卖的事有点难过

translation.en: I called a dozen places, and nothing.
translation.zh: 我打电话找了十几家 一无所获

translation.en: Won't people donate to the foundation with or without the auction?
translation.zh: 有没有拍卖会 人们都是会捐钱吧？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, they will, but… it's tradition.
translation.zh: 是啊 但…这是传统

translation.en: I think people like party favors, even if they pay for it themselves.
translation.zh: 人们很喜欢派对小礼品 即便要自掏腰包

translation.en: -You've been taking photos all week. -Yeah, every week.
translation.zh: -你一整周都在拍照 -对 每周都拍

translation.en: -How many do you have? -Oh, I don't know, hundreds.
translation.zh: 你有多少张？ 不知道 几百张吧 我没数过

translation.en: -I haven't counted. -Will you show me?
translation.zh: 不知道 几百张吧 我没数过 能让我看看吗？

translation.en: Yes. How long to get them printed and framed?
translation.zh: -可以 -冲印装裱要多久？

translation.en: Molly, that is a brilliant idea.
translation.zh: 莫莉 这主意太棒了

translation.en: Do we have everything? Yeah, I think so.
translation.zh: -全都齐了？ -我想是的

translation.en: And…
translation.zh: 还有…

translation.en: I got this for Aunt Jean's collection.
translation.zh: 这是我为珍姑姑的收藏添置的

translation.en: -I think she'll like it. -Yeah, I think so too.
translation.zh: -我觉得她会喜欢的 -对 我也这么想

translation.en: Should we tell her?
translation.zh: 要不要告诉她？

translation.en: Well, why don't we set everything up first,
translation.zh: 不如我们先摆好

translation.en: and then we could surprise her just before the Gala?
translation.zh: 然后在庆典前给她一个惊喜？

translation.en: Okay. Sounds like a plan.
translation.zh: 好 听起来不错

translation.en: Do you think people are actually gonna bid on these? -Are you fishing for a compliment? -[laughs]
translation.zh: -你觉得人们会出价吗？ -你在钓赞美之词吗？

translation.en: It's been a while since I've shared this kinda work.
translation.zh: 我已经很久没有展示这种作品了

translation.en: They could all use a little touching up.
translation.zh: 这些作品应该再修饰一下

translation.en: If I had more time… No one is gonna critique them.
translation.zh: -只是时间仓促… -不会有人批评的

translation.en: They're gonna bid on a photo that makes them feel something.
translation.zh: 他们会竞拍让自己有感触的照片

translation.en: Like this one.
translation.zh: 比如这张 它让我想到

translation.en: It reminds me of when my parents used to drive us around town to look at Christmas lights.
translation.zh: 以前父母开车带我们四处兜风 观赏圣诞彩灯

translation.en: It always made me feel so warm and cozy.
translation.zh: 总是让我感觉温暖惬意

translation.en: What? -I think you just gave me another idea. -[phone chimes]
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -你又让我想到一个点子

translation.en: I need to get back to the kitchen, but I can't wait to hear that idea.
translation.zh: 我得回厨房去了 但我很期待听你的想法

translation.en: Yeah, I've gotta see if it works first.
translation.zh: 我得先看看能不能行

translation.en: -Great. -Bye.
translation.zh: -好 -再见

translation.en: I thought you might like some tea.
translation.zh: 我想着也许你想喝点茶

translation.en: Oh, Robert, you are so thoughtful. Why don't you join me?
translation.zh: 罗伯特 你真体贴 跟我一起好吗？

translation.en: I'd be glad to. You anticipated me.
translation.zh: -我很乐意 -你料到了我的想法

translation.en: That's because you are always so thoughtful.
translation.zh: 那是因为你总是这么体贴

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -You always spill. -I do not.
translation.zh: -你总会洒 -才没有呢

translation.en: Carson surprised me with him. That was thoughtful of him.
translation.zh: -卡森送给我的惊喜 -他真体贴

translation.en: -Cheers. -Cheers.
translation.zh: -干杯 -干杯

translation.en: You know, I always looked forward to the Christmas Gala all year. Now…
translation.zh: 我一直都很期待圣诞庆典 如今…

translation.en: Well, now it just feels like a chore.
translation.zh: 现在感觉更像一份差事

translation.en: You've been doing the lion's share of the work for so long.
translation.zh: 一直以来 你一直都挑大梁

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Say it, I was foolish hoping that Carson would change his mind
translation.zh: 说出来 我一直傻傻地希望 卡森能改变主意 安顿下来接替我

translation.en: about settling down and taking over the foundation.
translation.zh: 卡森能改变主意 安顿下来接替我

translation.en: It wasn't foolish.
translation.zh: 一点也不傻

translation.en: Carson has always done things in his own way and in his own time.
translation.zh: 卡森总是按照自己的方式和步调做事

translation.en: You may be surprised. I don't think so.
translation.zh: -你也许会大吃一惊 -我看不然

translation.en: Once this Gala is done, I think I am going to have to focus on finding someone else.
translation.zh: 等今年的庆典一结束 我就得集中精力另找他人了

translation.en: What you have done with the foundation,
translation.zh: 你为基金会做了这么多

translation.en: no matter what happens or who you bring on board,
translation.zh: 无论结果如何 无论你选谁

translation.en: you will always be an inspiration to everyone who knows you.
translation.zh: 你永远都是身边人的榜样

translation.en: Robert.
translation.zh: 罗伯特

translation.en: That means more than you know.
translation.zh: 你根本不知道这话对我意义有多重大

translation.en: Thank you. You are a dear.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你真贴心

translation.en: Did you confirm the servers? -Yeah, they'll be here by four. -Great.
translation.zh: -你确认服务生的事了吗？ -他们四点就来

translation.en: Carson said most people should be gone by 9:00,
translation.zh: 很好 卡森说多数人九点就离开

translation.en: and if anyone complains, to send them to him.
translation.zh: 如果有人抱怨 就让他们去找他

translation.en: He's been very helpful this week. You really like him.
translation.zh: -他这周帮了大忙 -你很喜欢他嘛

translation.en: Don't deny it.
translation.zh: 别否认

translation.en: I mean, he's smart, and funny, and charming.
translation.zh: 我是说 他聪明风趣有魅力

translation.en: Okay, it was unexpected.
translation.zh: 好吧 我没想到

translation.en: I have never heard you gush about anyone like that.
translation.zh: 我从未听你这样 滔滔不绝地聊过任何事

translation.en: -Does he know how you feel? -He's a client, Christina.
translation.zh: -他知道你的感受吗？ -他是客户 克里斯蒂娜

translation.en: I think that you should meet him under the mistletoe
translation.zh: 我觉得你们应该在槲寄生下相见

translation.en: and show him exactly how you feel.
translation.zh: 让他知道你的真实感受

translation.en: Very funny.
translation.zh: 你真搞笑

translation.en: He already said his job makes relationships impossible,
translation.zh: 他已经说过 因为工作 很难发展恋情

translation.en: and I don't wanna waste any more time on someone who's unavailable.
translation.zh: 我不想在没空的男人身上浪费时间

translation.en: Okay. I just…
translation.zh: 好吧 我只是…

translation.en: Well, I believe that life's too short to leave the most important things left unsaid.
translation.zh: 人生苦短 重要的话一定要说出来

translation.en: Noted.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: -I gotta go. I'll see you there. -Yeah, see you there.
translation.zh: -我得走了 到时见 -好的

translation.en: Tell him! [laughs]
translation.zh: 告诉他哟

translation.en: -Good morning. -Morning.
translation.zh: -早上好 -早安

translation.en: -I was just looking for Molly. -She's not here yet.
translation.zh: -我在找莫莉 -她还没来

translation.en: -I see. -Muffin?
translation.zh: -这样啊 -小松糕？

translation.en: -No, thanks. -Something on your mind?
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢 -你有心事？ -我在想庆典的事

translation.en: I was just thinking about the Gala.
translation.zh: -你有心事？ -我在想庆典的事

translation.en: After tonight, you'll be off the hook for another year.
translation.zh: 不用担心 过了今晚 你又可以解脱一年

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I'm just thinking about my legacy as a Harrison.
translation.zh: 我在想作为哈里森家族成员 我能留下什么

translation.en: This sounds serious.
translation.zh: 听起来很严肃

translation.en: I've always fought so hard against it, and now I'm starting to wonder… why?
translation.zh: 我一直都在拼命反抗 现在我开始纳闷…究竟为了什么

translation.en: Everyone wants to know that what they do matters.
translation.zh: 每个人都希望自己做的事很重要

translation.en: It gives our life meaning.
translation.zh: 这让我们的生命有意义

translation.en: But it's up to you to determine what that should be.
translation.zh: 但你要自己决定是何种意义

translation.en: Aren't you always telling me I have an obligation to my family?
translation.zh: 你不是总说我对家人负有责任吗？

translation.en: You do. But you also have one to yourself.
translation.zh: 没错 但你也要对自己负责

translation.en: The other servers were supposed to be here by now.
translation.zh: 服务生在哪里？他们应该到了的

translation.en: They got lost. They'll be here in five.
translation.zh: -他们迷路了 五分钟后到 -进展如何？

translation.en: How's everything going?
translation.zh: -他们迷路了 五分钟后到 -进展如何？ 你是来做志愿副主厨的吗？

translation.en: Are you here to volunteer your sous chef services?
translation.zh: 你是来做志愿副主厨的吗？

translation.en: No, not this time. But can I steal you for a few minutes?
translation.zh: 不 这次不行 能借一步跟你说句话吗？

translation.en: You do know I'm trying to serve a big party, right?
translation.zh: 你知道我在为大型派对提供服务吧？

translation.en: Yes, I know, Molly, but it won't take long, I promise.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道 莫莉 但不会太久 我保证

translation.en: -Are you good? -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -你没问题吧？ -嗯

translation.en: -Okay. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -好 -谢谢

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？ 卡森 我没时间搞这一套

translation.en: Carson, I do not have time for this.
translation.zh: 卡森 我没时间搞这一套

translation.en: Well, we have a little surprise for you.
translation.zh: 我们有个惊喜给你

translation.en: You know I'm not one for surprises. Well, hopefully, you'll like this one.
translation.zh: -你知道我不喜欢惊喜 -希望你会喜欢这个

translation.en: Open your eyes.
translation.zh: 睁开眼睛

translation.en: [Jean] What did you do?
translation.zh: 你做了什么？

translation.en: It's for the silent auction.
translation.zh: 这是为无声拍卖准备的

translation.en: Are these your photographs?
translation.zh: 这些是你拍的照片吗？

translation.en: They are.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: It was Molly's brilliant idea.
translation.zh: 这是莫莉想出的绝妙主意

translation.en: In fact, she inspired me to involve the children from the community center,
translation.zh: 事实上 是她启发了我 让社区中心的孩子们参与进来

translation.en: and this is their artwork.
translation.zh: 这些是他们的作品

translation.en: -This was your idea? -Thanks to you.
translation.zh: 这是你的主意？ 多亏了你

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: Well, it's… it's not my usual work, but, uh… what do you think?
translation.zh: 这不是我平常的工作 但你觉得呢？

translation.en: I think it's your best work ever. -Thank you. -Oh!
translation.zh: 我觉得这是你最好的作品 谢谢

translation.en: -And thank you! -Oh, you're welcome!
translation.zh: -也谢谢你 -不客气

translation.en: Carson said you were impressive, and he was right.
translation.zh: 卡森说你很了不起 他说得没错

translation.en: I must go tell Robert! Thank you. You've saved the day.
translation.zh: 我得去告诉罗伯特 谢谢你今天救了场

translation.en: Did you say that?
translation.zh: 这话是你说的？

translation.en: Yes, I did.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Look, I've met a lot of people in my life,
translation.zh: 听着 我这辈子遇到过很多人

translation.en: and… you're definitely one of the most impressive.
translation.zh: 而你绝对是最令人印象深刻的

translation.en: [woman] Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: -Carson! -Isabella. -Hi. -What are you doing here?
translation.zh: -卡森！嗨！ -伊莎贝拉！你来这里做什么？

translation.en: If you would answer your phone, you would know that Aliyah Traci
translation.zh: 如果你接电话 就会知道

translation.en: requested you to photograph her spur-of-the-moment Christmas party in Berlin.
translation.zh: 阿利雅·崔西请你 去柏林帮她的圣诞派对拍照

translation.en: The Aliyah Traci? Uh, sorry, this is Molly.
translation.zh: -传说中的阿利雅·崔西？ -抱歉 这位是莫莉

translation.en: This is Isabella, my agent.
translation.zh: -这是伊莎贝拉 我的经纪人 -你好

translation.en: Well? Go grab your gear. I've got a car waiting to take us to the airport.
translation.zh: 去拿你的设备 我有车送我们去机场

translation.en: Come on, we need to go. Go grab your stuff.
translation.zh: 我们得走了 去拿你的东西

translation.en: -Uh, Isabella-- -I should get back to the kitchen.
translation.zh: 伊莎贝拉… 我该回厨房去了 很高兴认识你

translation.en: It was nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 我该回厨房去了 很高兴认识你

translation.en: I asked you not to book me for anything until after Christmas.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 圣诞节前别给我安排工作

translation.en: I know you said that, but this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
translation.zh: 我知道你是这么说的 但这是千载难逢的机会

translation.en: See, thing is, my family, they only ask one thing of me,
translation.zh: 问题是 我的家人对我只有一个要求

translation.en: and that's that I'm here for the annual Christmas Gala,
translation.zh: 每年回来参加圣诞庆典

translation.en: so I can't leave now.
translation.zh: 所以我现在不能离开

translation.en: Okay, uh… when's the Gala, tonight? Yeah.
translation.zh: -好吧 庆典什么时候？今晚？ -对

translation.en: We can leave right after, or early in the morning.
translation.zh: 我们可以在庆典后马上出发 明天一大早也行

translation.en: It'll be tight, but I can make it work. Yeah. I don't know.
translation.zh: -时间会很紧 但我应该能搞定 -难说…

translation.en: Carson, this gig is everything we've been working towards.
translation.zh: 这可是我们一直努力的目标 你接下它 以后就是顶流盛会

translation.en: Do this, you're on the shortlist of photographers
translation.zh: 你接下它 以后就是顶流盛会

translation.en: for every A-list event there is. This is your golden opportunity.
translation.zh: 摄影师优先候选 这是你的大好机会

translation.en: You're right. No, you're right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. Okay, come on. Get me a drink.
translation.zh: 对啊 来吧 给我弄点喝的

translation.en: Okay, holiday punch is ready to go.
translation.zh: 圣诞潘趣酒搞定了

translation.en: Good, looks good.
translation.zh: 很好 看起来不错

translation.en: Are you all right? Did something happen?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？发生什么事了吗？

translation.en: Carson's agent is here. She's beautiful, by the way.
translation.zh: 卡森的经纪人来了 对了 她很漂亮

translation.en: Is she here for the Gala?
translation.zh: 她是来参加庆典的吗？

translation.en: No, she booked him to photograph Aliyah Traci's Christmas party in Berlin.
translation.zh: 不 她安排他去柏林拍摄 阿利雅·崔西的圣诞派对

translation.en: Whoa, he's a big deal! But that means that he's leaving.
translation.zh: 哇 他够厉害的！ 但这意味着他要走了

translation.en: This is exactly why I didn't wanna get involved. I knew he wasn't staying.
translation.zh: 所以我才不想跟他有瓜葛 我就知道他不会留下来

translation.en: I can't worry about it now.
translation.zh: 我现在不能操心这件事

translation.en: I need to focus on making sure that this dinner is perfect.
translation.zh: 我要专心确保晚宴做到完美

translation.en: -Yeah. -Just checking, how's everything?
translation.zh: -嗯 -我来看看你们 进展如何？

translation.en: -Great! -Great! We are almost ready to get this Gala started.
translation.zh: 很顺利！庆典差不多可以开始了

translation.en: Excellent.
translation.zh: 太好了 姜饼

translation.en: Gingerbread, my favorite.
translation.zh: 太好了 姜饼 我的最爱 可以吗？

translation.en: -May I? -Please do. I added them to the menu for you.
translation.zh: 请用 我为了你才把它放上菜单的

translation.en: That was very thoughtful of you.
translation.zh: 你真贴心

translation.en: I'm also meant to tell you that Carson is hoping for a private word with you.
translation.zh: 另外我要告诉你 卡森想找你私下说句话

translation.en: I don't have time.
translation.zh: 我没时间 之后再跟他谈吧

translation.en: I will have to speak with him later, if he's still here.
translation.zh: 我没时间 之后再跟他谈吧 如果他到时还在的话

translation.en: All right, I'll tell him.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会告诉他

translation.en: Okay, food is ready, drinks are set, the servers are setting the dessert table.
translation.zh: 食物和饮品都准备就绪 服务生在准备甜点台

translation.en: Am I forgetting anything? You might wanna get changed.
translation.zh: -我忘了什么吗？ -你可能得换身衣服

translation.en: Right. Okay, thank you.
translation.zh: 对 好 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Don, it's good to see you.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 唐 很高兴见到你

translation.en: And to you, my friend. We'll see you inside.
translation.zh: 你也是 我的朋友 -里面见 -当然

translation.en: Merry Christmas. Thank you for being with us. We're delighted that you're here. Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 谢谢你能来 我们很高兴你能赏光

translation.en: Don.
translation.zh: 唐

translation.en: Inspired photos and artwork. My wife has bid on at least three already.
translation.zh: 充满灵感的照片和艺术品 我妻子已经竞拍至少三件了

translation.en: It was Carson's idea to incorporate
translation.zh: 加入社区中心孩子的画作

translation.en: the children's art from the Harrison Community Center.
translation.zh: 加入社区中心孩子的画作 是卡森的主意 会很棒的 我为你骄傲

translation.en: It's gonna be good. I'm proud of you.
translation.zh: 会很棒的 我为你骄傲

translation.en: Congratulations to you.
translation.zh: 恭喜你

translation.en: I haven't done anything yet.
translation.zh: 我还什么都没做呢

translation.en: Well, get ready. After this, you are gonna be in high demand.
translation.zh: 做好准备 过了今天 你会变得炙手可热的

translation.en: Hey, look at you. You clean up nicely.
translation.zh: 嘿 瞧瞧你！收拾得真漂亮 谢谢

translation.en: [Molly] Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: How's everything going?
translation.zh: 一切都还好吧？

translation.en: We are ready to serve as soon as they're ready to eat.
translation.zh: 只要他们准备开吃 我们就可以上菜

translation.en: That's right after the introduction speeches.
translation.zh: 那就是在介绍演讲之后

translation.en: Good evening. Good evening, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 晚上好 女士们 先生们

translation.en: Welcome to this year's Christmas Gala for the Harrison Foundation.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到哈里森基金会 今年的圣诞庆典

translation.en: Thanks to all of you here,
translation.zh: 得益于在座各位 社区内数以千计的民众

translation.en: thousands of people in our community are living enriched and better lives.
translation.zh: 得益于在座各位 社区内数以千计的民众 过上了更加丰富美好的生活

translation.en: I also want to thank my nephew, Carson Jacob,
translation.zh: 我还要感谢我的侄子 卓越的摄影师

translation.en: the extraordinary photographer
translation.zh: 卡森·雅各布

translation.en: who is responsible for this year's silent auction artwork.
translation.zh: 是他提供了今年无声拍卖的艺术品

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you, Aunt Jean.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 珍姨

translation.en: Thank you all for being here tonight, and merry Christmas to you all.
translation.zh: 多谢各位今晚光临 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Well, I've spent most of my life trying to find meaning through a camera lens,
translation.zh: 我这辈子一直在透过镜头 寻找意义

translation.en: but this last week has opened my eyes
translation.zh: 但过去这一周令我大开眼界

translation.en: to the real differences that we make in people's lives every day.
translation.zh: 让我看到了我们为大家的生活 所带来的实实在在的改变

translation.en: I've been privileged to play my small part in this year's Christmas Gala,
translation.zh: 我很荣幸能为今年的圣诞庆典 尽一份绵薄之力

translation.en: and I'm very happy to announce that I will be taking a more active role
translation.zh: 我也非常高兴地宣布 明年的圣诞庆典 我会更加积极参与

translation.en: in next year's Christmas Gala, and who knows what the future holds?
translation.zh: 明年的圣诞庆典 我会更加积极参与 谁知道未来会怎样？

translation.en: So, everyone, please enjoy. Enjoy your drinks, enjoy dinner, enjoy the night.
translation.zh: 所以大家请尽情地 享用美食美酒 享受良宵

translation.en: You don't have to bid on my photographs or the children's paintings,
translation.zh: 各位不必竞拍 我的照片或孩子们的画作

translation.en: but if you don't, I will tell the children.
translation.zh: 但如果你们不出手 我就告诉孩子们

translation.en: Enjoy, everyone.
translation.zh: 好好享受吧

translation.en: What a terrific evening!
translation.zh: 多么美好的夜晚！

translation.en: It really is.
translation.zh: 的确如此

translation.en: Can I help you with something? Please chill this for later.
translation.zh: -需要帮忙吗？ -请把这个冰镇一下 一会喝

translation.en: We're celebrating Carson's decision
translation.zh: 我们要庆祝卡森作出决定

translation.en: to take a more active role in the foundation.
translation.zh: 在基金会中扮演更积极的角色

translation.en: I heard his speech.
translation.zh: 我听到了他的演讲

translation.en: Assigning him to oversee the catering
translation.zh: 让他负责宴会餐饮

translation.en: was the best thing I could've done to get him involved.
translation.zh: 是我能想到让他参与的最好方法

translation.en: You assigned him to oversee me? Like… like a job?
translation.zh: 您让他监督我？这是他的工作任务？

translation.en: Yes, and it worked like a charm.
translation.zh: 没错 而且很成功

translation.en: I believe that things work out the way they're supposed to,
translation.zh: 我相信事情会按应有的走向发展

translation.en: but sometimes you just have to give a little nudge, if you know what I mean.
translation.zh: 但有时候 你得稍微推一把 你懂我意思吧

translation.en: The food is just delicious. I hope you will continue catering for me.
translation.zh: 食物很好吃 我希望你能继续为我提供服务

translation.en: Yes, I would love to. That's exactly what I was hoping for.
translation.zh: 是的 我很乐意 这正是我所希望的

translation.en: Good. I must get back to my guests. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 很好 我得回去照顾客人了 非常感谢

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: The next board meeting's on the 15th. If you're in town, come.
translation.zh: 下次董事会是15号 你应该来

translation.en: We have some new agenda items to discuss.
translation.zh: 我们有新的项目要讨论

translation.en: I'll have to check my schedule, but whatever the board decides,
translation.zh: 我得确认一下行程 但无论董事会做何决定

translation.en: please keep that community center going.
translation.zh: 请务必确保社区中心继续运营

translation.en: All right, we will.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们会的

translation.en: Yeah. It means a lot to a lot of people.
translation.zh: 对 它对很多人来说意义重大

translation.en: -If you'll excuse me. -Of course.
translation.zh: -失陪一下 -当然

translation.en: Hey, you wanna take a break? I can handle it from here.
translation.zh: 你想休息一下吗？我可以应付

translation.en: -Am I that obvious? -No, but I know you.
translation.zh: -我这么明显吗？ -没有 但我了解你

translation.en: Yeah, I could use some air. I owe you one.
translation.zh: 是的 我需要透透气 我欠你一个人情

translation.en: Okay, really good to see you guys. Thank you. Bye.
translation.zh: 好 很高兴见到你们 谢谢 再见

translation.en: -Uh… -Chocolate mousse? No, thanks. Was Molly just here?
translation.zh: -巧克力慕斯？ -不 谢谢 莫莉刚才在这里吗？

translation.en: Um, no, I'm not sure.
translation.zh: 不 我不确定

translation.en: I heard about Aliyah Traci. That's pretty amazing.
translation.zh: 我听说了阿利雅·崔西的事 太厉害了

translation.en: It is, isn't it? I'm so proud of you.
translation.zh: 可不是吗？我为你骄傲

translation.en: Never give up on your dream, and look at him now.
translation.zh: 永远不要放弃你的梦想 看看现在的他

translation.en: So I booked the jet for 10:00 sharp tomorrow morning.
translation.zh: 我订了明天早上十点的飞机

translation.en: And your gear I'm gonna have sent to Berlin
translation.zh: 我会把你的设备运到柏林

translation.en: so you don't have to worry about that.
translation.zh: 这样你就不用担心…

translation.en: Hi, Christina.
translation.zh: 嗨 克里斯蒂娜

translation.en: I'm looking for Molly. She's not answering her phone.
translation.zh: 我在找莫莉 她不接电话

translation.en: Oh, she had to go prep a Christmas Eve brunch for tomorrow,
translation.zh: 她要为明天的 平安夜早午餐订单做准备

translation.en: but she asked me to say goodbye for her, and to give you a message.
translation.zh: 但她让我代为向你道别 并且给你捎句话

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 你说

translation.en: If you were happy with our services,
translation.zh: 如果你对我们的服务满意

translation.en: I know she'd be grateful if you left a positive review online.
translation.zh: 在网上为我们留一条积极评价 我相信她会十分感激

translation.en: -That's it? -That's it.
translation.zh: -就这样？ -就这样

translation.en: Sure. It's the least I can do.
translation.zh: 好 这是我最起码能做的事

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: That's everyone.
translation.zh: 大家都走了

translation.en: -Oh, it was a great evening! -Mm-hmm. [laughs]
translation.zh: 今晚很圆满

translation.en: Well, what a night.
translation.zh: 真是个美好的夜晚

translation.en: I just came to say good night. Where's Isabella?
translation.zh: -我是来跟你道晚安的 -伊莎贝拉在哪里？

translation.en: Oh, I walked her to her car. She's staying at a B&B downtown.
translation.zh: 我送她上了车 她住在市中心的一家民宿

translation.en: Why don't I find us a few glasses so we can have a toast?
translation.zh: 你何不拿几个杯子来？ 我们共同干一杯

translation.en: Well, actually, I've got an early flight in the morning.
translation.zh: 其实我明早要赶早班飞机

translation.en: Do what you need to do. I understand.
translation.zh: 那你自己考量 我能理解

translation.en: You do?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Carson, the foundation has always been my passion.
translation.zh: 卡森 基金会一直是我的热情所在

translation.en: Seeing your work tonight helped me realize that photography is yours.
translation.zh: 看到你今晚的作品 让我意识到摄影是你的热情所在

translation.en: You must do what makes you happy,
translation.zh: 你必须做让自己快乐的事

translation.en: and I will be glad to have you in the foundation
translation.zh: 我很乐意让你在基金会

translation.en: at whatever level you choose.
translation.zh: 从事任何你选择的工作

translation.en: Thank you, Aunt Jean.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I really appreciate everything you did for us this week.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你这周为我们做的一切

translation.en: Now, you go get some rest.
translation.zh: 好了 你去休息吧

translation.en: Good night, Aunt Jean.
translation.zh: 晚安 珍姑姑

translation.en: -Good night, Robert. -Good night.
translation.zh: -晚安 罗伯特 -晚安

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Well…
translation.zh: 好了…

translation.en: apart from Carson leaving early, this night could not have been better.
translation.zh: 只可惜卡森要提前离开 不然今晚简直堪称完美

translation.en: I had every faith in you.
translation.zh: -我对你绝对有信心 -哦 罗伯特

translation.en: Oh, Robert, you truly are the best.

translation.en: I don't know what I would do without you.

translation.en: No, wait.

translation.en: There's something that I have wanted to tell you for a long time now.

translation.en: I hope it's the same thing I have been wanting to tell you.

translation.en: Robert.
translation.zh: 罗伯特

translation.en: You're fired.

translation.en: I don't know what I would do without you, and I never want to find out.

translation.en: I love you, Jean.

translation.en: -Will you marry me? -Oh, yes.
translation.zh: 我爱你 珍 你愿意嫁给我吗？ 罗伯特 我愿意！

translation.en: Oh, yes, Robert.

translation.en: I love you too. Yes!

translation.en: Hey! I just dropped off the Christmas cupcake tree,

translation.en: Yeah, we… we already have a big New Year's Eve party

translation.en: and ten events in January.

translation.en: What? That's incredible. You must be thrilled.

translation.en: He is living his best life, and I am focusing on mine.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. I suppose that's right.

translation.en: Clean break is the best way to move on faster. Right.
translation.zh: -利落分手是最好的方法 -对

translation.en: And you know what?

translation.en: Jimmy's got a bunch of single friends that I can introduce you to.

translation.en: You know, I have everything handled here.

translation.en: Why don't you take tomorrow off and spend time with Jimmy over the holidays?

translation.en: -If you're sure. -Yeah.

translation.en: Aww! Merry Christmas.

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: I like this. I'm glad you like it.

translation.en: We're getting married.

translation.en: [gasps] Well, it's about time.

translation.en: -Congratulations. -Oh, thank you.

translation.en: Am I doing the right thing here? Only you know that.

translation.en: and it's wonderful,

translation.en: but you must listen with your heart to find the right answer.

translation.en: I love you.

translation.en: I love you too.

translation.en: Congratulations again, you crazy kids.

translation.en: Bye.

translation.en: Fashion show, supermodel's birthday party, so much.

translation.en: Isabella. I really appreciate everything you've done for me,

translation.en: but I just realized that I wanna do something more meaningful with my life.

translation.en: I wanna spend my days with people I care about, who care about me too.

translation.en: I'm staying.

translation.en: Is this about the caterer? Yeah, it is.

translation.en: -I hope she's worth what you're giving up. -Oh, she's worth what I'll be gaining.

translation.en: True love always is.

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you for everything.

translation.en: -Thanks. You too. -Okay.

translation.en: Oh, my goodness.

translation.en: You are marvelous!

translation.en: Seven o'clock.

translation.en: Okay.

translation.en: Do you want to taste this?

translation.en: -Oh, thank you. -Hickory nuts.

translation.en: but I think I'm gonna take my chances, see how I do on my own.

translation.en: Twist it like that, and focus with that, and see what happens in the lens.

translation.en: Try and take one there.

translation.en: Uh, hold on to that with dear life.

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I, uh… I brought the fudge.

translation.en: The fudge?

translation.en: She was supposed to be here,

translation.en: but she had to do something with Robert at the last minute,

translation.en: and she asked me to cover for her.

translation.en: Really?

translation.en: Thanks.

translation.en: Not anymore.

translation.en: You're looking at the new
translation.zh: 站在你面前的是哈里森基金会

translation.en: Executive Director of the Harrison Foundation,
translation.zh: 站在你面前的是哈里森基金会 新任执行董事兼首席摄影师

translation.en: slash Chief Photographer.
translation.zh: 新任执行董事兼首席摄影师

translation.en: Okay.

translation.en: Molly.
translation.zh: 莫莉…

translation.en: This is my home.

translation.en: And over the last week, someone very special to me
translation.zh: 在过去的一周里 有个很特别的人… 让我透过全新的角度看人生

translation.en: has shown me life through a new lens.
translation.zh: 有个很特别的人… 让我透过全新的角度看人生

translation.en: And I'm never gonna look back.

translation.en: Yeah, I think so.
translation.zh: 我想是的

translation.en: Does this sound good to you?
translation.zh: -你觉得这样好吗？ -挺好的

translation.en: Yeah, it sounds better than peppermint hot cocoa.
translation.zh: -你觉得这样好吗？ -挺好的 听起来比薄荷热可可还好

translation.en: -You're absolutely right. -I know. [chuckles]

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Molly.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐
